name: Golden Rune (4) - x1 Morne Tunnel
description: One can be looted off a corpse inside the small shack in Morne Tunnel.

name: 2x Smoldering Butterfly
description: 2 Smoldering Butterflies scattered among the corpses in the Fire Monk camp.

name: 3x Golden Rune (1) F
description: At least 3x Golden Runes (1) along the road north-east of Church of Elleh. Inside skulls. Perform an attack to loot.

name: 4x Arteria Leaf (B)
description: 4x Arteria Leaf on the west side of Ailing Village, behind the cabins.

name: 9x Smithing Stone (4) B
description: There are at least 9 Smithing Stones (4) within the cave that goes through Ruin-Strewn Precipice.

name: Abandoned Cave
description: East of Smoldering Wall Grace on the eastern wall of the canyon, and slightly northwest of the Sellia Evergaol. The location is only reachable by approaching from the west and crossing the canyon using a tree.

name: Abandoned Coffin
description: Site of Grace found at the foot of a hill littered with broken down stagecoaches.

name: Abductor Virgin
description: Site of Grace found in the underground caverns of Volcano Manor. Accessible after defeating the Abductor Virgins.

name: Abductor Virgins
description: Optional Boss. Found in the cave under Volcano Manor by heading south from the Subterranean Inquisition Chamber Site of Grace and falling through the floor.

name: Academy Crystal Cave
description: Site of grace located inside a cave. Need to use a Stonesword Key in order to access it.

name: Academy Crystal Cave
description: A cave located east of the Academy. Requires a Stonesword Key in order to unlock the seal. Grants passage to the Academy.

name: Academy Gate Town
description: A sunken town, now crawling with soldiers and all kinds of powerful sea creatures.

name: Academy Gate Town (Sites of Grace)
description: Site of grace in the deluged part of the academy town.

name: Academy Glintstone Key
description: Key used to unlock the gate of Raya Lucaria Academy

name: Academy Glintstone Key B
description: Looted off a corpse that's on the chandelier of Church of the Cuckoo. The only way to reach this is going through the broken glass window of the church via the rooftops of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Academy Glintstone Staff
description: Can be found on Sorcerer Thops' body.

name: Academy Scroll
description: Key Item. Give to a mage to unlock more sorceries. It's by one of the big gravestones where the Skeleton Mages are rising.

name: Adan, Thief of Fire
description: Optional Boss. Imprisoned within the Malefactor's Evergaol. Drops the Flame of the Fell God spell upon defeat.

name: Adula's Moonblade
description: Dropped by the Glintstone Dragon Adula in the Cathedral of Manus Celes.

name: Aeonia Swamp Shore
description: Site of Grace found within the Swamp of Aeonia

name: Aeonian Butterfly
description: 1 Aeonian Butterfly can be found on a body in the middle of the swamp here

name: Agheel Lake North
description: Site of Grace found next to the main road east of the Gatefront Ruins.

name: Agheel Lake South
description: Site of Grace located over a rocky terrain, near a herd of Sheep.

name: Ailing Village
description: A small, abandoned village inhabited only by hostile Demi-human enemies.

name: Ainsel River Well
description: A small structure housing a lift that takes you down to the Ainsel River.

name: Alabaster Lord
description: Optional Boss imprisoned within the Royal Grave Evergaol.

name: Albinauric Rise
description: Puzzle tower found northeast of the Consecrated Snowfield. Unlocking the seal requires you to summon your Fanged Imp Ashes and defeating one of the imps that spawn around the tower.

name: Albus
description: NPC who is hiding from the calamity that befell the Village of the Albinaurics

name: Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader
description: Field boss imprisoned within the Ringleader's Evergaol. Drops the Spirit Ashes upon defeat.

name: Altar South
description: Site of Grace next to Chelona's Rise.

name: Altus Highway Junction
description: Site of Grace

name: Altus Plateau (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace

name: Altus Tunnel
description: Can be found directly south from the Minor Erdtree in Altus Plateau.

name: Altus Tunnel (Site of Grace)
description: Site of Grace found just inside the Altus Tunnel

name: Amber Starlight
description: Key item requested by Seluvis to progress his quest further.

name: Ambush Shard
description: Weeping Peninsula: Found on a corpse in the underground jail of the Witchbane Ruins.

name: Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater A
description: Hostile invader with cloth armor and a curved greatsword equipped. Invades when you first approach the Smoldering Church.

name: Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater B
description: NPC Invader. The second time Anastasia invades is as the player approaches the Corpse-Stench Shack.

name: Ancient Death Rancor
description: Dropped by the Death Rite Bird in Liurnia of the Lake, to the east of Raya Lucaria Academy at night, south of the Gate Town North site of grace.

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook (1)
description: Found on a body in the Wyndham Catacombs, in the room behind the rusted bars in the sewers. Can be reached by going under the raising floor in the room with the spike ceiling.

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook (3)
description: Cookbook item found at the Cathedral of Dragon Communion. Looted off a corpse tucked under the dragon's chest.

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [2]
description: Can be purchased from a Mechant that you can found between Writheblood Ruins and The Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau).

name: Ancient Dragon Apostle's Cookbook [4]
description: Can be acquired at the top roof of Crumbling Farum Azula. You will find the Cookbook after defeating the dragon, passing the building behind it.

name: Ancient Dragon Knight Kristoff Ashes
description: Can be found in Sainted Hero's Grave west of Leyndell, the Royal Capital.

name: Ancient Dragon Lansseax
description: A large white 4 winged dragon.

name: Ancient Dragon Lansseax (Altus Plateau)
description: Southwest of Rampartside path. It will only appear if you defeat it first at its first location. Drops Lansseax's Glaive

name: Ancient Dragon Prayerbook
description: In the middle of the big hall found after the Crumbling Beast Grave Depths site of grace.

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse in front of a statue in in Miquella's Haligtree. Guarded by an axe-wielding Misbegotten.

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone
description: Found in a chest, at the top of a tower, no traps or tricks.

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone (A)
description: Upgrade Material. Found on a corpse on a floating platform, guarded by a beastman. This platform can be reached by jumping on a floating pillar connecting to it.

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone (Consecrated Snowfield Boss Drop)
description: Dropped by one of the two mini-boss Night's Cavalry guarding a Consecrated Fields caravan at night, alongside the Night's Cavalry Set

name: Ancient Dragon Smithing Stone - 1x (Yelough Anix Tunnel)
description: After defeating Astel, Stars of Darkness there's a cavity behind guarded by a Mob Onyx Lord. At the corner of t5he cavity there's a dead body holding the item.

name: Ancient Hero of Zamor
description: Optional Boss imprisoned within the Weeping Evergaol.

name: Ancient Hero of Zamor (Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave)
description: Optional Boss. Found at the end of the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave. Drops the Zamor Curved Sword and the entire Zamor Armor Set upon defeat.

name: Ancient Snow Valley Ruins
description: Site of Grace found below the bridge south of Stargazer's Ruins.

name: Antspur Rapier
description: Thrusting Sword. Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan upon defeat.

name: Apostate Derelict
description: Church and Site of Grace near a Walking Mausoleum

name: Arbalest
description:
Using a Stonesword Key to access, additionally obtaining the Godskin prayerbook and Godslayer Seal:
From the Rampart Tower bonfire, take the shortcut lift down to where the Grafted miniboss is fought inside the storeroom (or reach this point manually). Exit into the courtyard with the flamethrowers and barricades. Take an immediate left and hug the wall until you enter a cellar containing rats. You will hit a fog wall that requires one Stonesword Key to open. Continue past this fog wall until you reach an outdoors area again. Pull an immediate right and hug the wall until you reach a ladder. Continue past this point and almost all the way across the bridge, then jump to the rocky outcropping to your right (it's a tight jump). Continue and jump back into a walled-in area with a ballista. The Arbalest is on a corpse in that area.

name: Armorer's Cookbook (1)
description: Can be found inside a small camp of Soldiers and Wolves.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [4]
description: Can be found in Redmane Castle. in the northwestern gate house.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [5]
description: Can be found in Redmane Castle.

name: Armorer's Cookbook [7]
description: Can be found on the bottom floor once past the wooden door.

name: Arrow's Reach Talisman
description: Found in a chest inside the Tower above Stormgate that can be accessed going all around it.

name: Arrow's Sting Talisman
description: Found in the chest at the top of the tower next to the Impassable Greatbridge.

name: Arsenal Charm +1
description: In Altus Tunnel, drop down onto a platform below and then climb up the tree root to a higher platform where the charm will be waiting on a body.

name: Arteria Leaf
description: Rare Crafting Material. Found on a corpse sitting on a chair at the beach. Guarded by 4 Spirit Jellyfish.

name: Arteria Leaf
description: Near the area of the Flying Dragon Agheel. It is surrounded by Poison Pods, against a tomb.

name: Arteria Leaf - X2 MORNE TUNNEL
description: Two can be looted off a corpse that is being eaten by two Misbegotten enemies in Morne Tunnel.

name: Artist's Shack
description: A small cabin in North Liurnia of The Lakes. Its strongly perceived tranquility seems overshadowed by oblivion.

name: Artist's Shack
description: Site of Grace at Artist's Shack.

name: Artist's Shack (Limgrave)
description: A broken shack with a collectible picture. Many such shacks can be found in The Lands Between.

name: Ash of War: Barbaric Roar
description: On a Teardrop Beetle in Ravine-Veiled Village, found by going as far northeast as possible in Lake of Liurnia (near but not accessible from Grand Lift of Dectus)

name: Ash of War: Barrage
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the narrow channel north of Seethewater River.

name: Ash of War: Barricade Shield
description: Dropped by Night's Cavalry Miniboss found patrolling the roads around the Castle Morne Ramparts. Only appears at night.

name: Ash of War: Beast's Roar
description: Reward from Gurranq, Beast Clergyman after giving him the fourth Deathroot

name: Ash of War: Black Flame Tornado
description: Ash of War. Dropped by the Godskin Duo upon defeat.

name: Ash of War: Blood Blade
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in Altus Plateau, northeast of Erdtree-Gazing Hill, flying above a pond with trees.

name: Ash of War: Bloodhound's Step
description: Dropped by a Night's Cavalry at the bridge in front of the Lenne's Rise tower,

name: Ash of War: Bloody Slash
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Beast Crest Heater Knight fought at the top of the ramparts of Fort Haight.

name: Ash of War: Carian Grandeur
description: Ash of War. Found on a corpse on the roof of a tall stone structure. This is accessible by jumping down the cliffside graveyard from the manor's upper level.

name: Ash of War: Charge Forth
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab. You'll find it attached to a ceiling, under some Poison Pods.

name: Ash of War: Chilling Mist
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the ruins south of Renna's Rise.

name: Ash of War: Cragblade
description: Can be found at West of Impassable Greatbridge site, on a scarab in the sword monument

name: Ash of War: Determination
description: It drops from a Teardrop Scarab, north of Agheel Lake, near a group of soldiers.

name: Ash of War: Double Slash
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found high up on a very large root. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops.

name: Ash of War: Flame of the Redmanes
description: Ash of War. Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab near the North Fort Gael Site of Grace

name: Ash of War: Flaming Strike
description: dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in a small graveyard along the south cliffside behind the castle. From the front gate, hug right along the cliff towards the ballista, going up and past the vampire bats. There will be a small gap in the cliff that must be jumped across to get to the graveyard.

name: Ash of War: Giant Hunt
description: Dropped by the lone wandering Troll Knight.

name: Ash of War: Giant Hunt
description: Ash of War dropped by miniboss <a href="/Night's+Cavalry" target="_blank">Night's Cavalry. Only appears at night.

name: Ash of War: Golden Parry
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found within the Capital Outskirts.

name: Ash of War: Golden Slam
description: Sacred affinity Ash of War. Obtained by defeating a Teardrop Scarab in Woodfolk Ruins.

name: Ash of War: Golden Vow
description: Ash of War: Golden Vow provides Sacred affinity and the Golden Vow Skill. Dropped upon defeating Mounted Knight.

name: Ash of War: Gravitas
description: Looted from a Slender Wayfarer that uses the Gravitas skill as one of its attacks when it fights. You can find the enemy roaming by the beach side at the stone arch that has a bonfire, near the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace.

name: Ash of War: Ground Slam
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found rolling down the hill west of the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood.

name: Ash of War: Hoarfrost Stomp
description: Ash Of War Upgrade. Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming around the shallow water. Look for its glowing footprints and attack as the prints move towards you.

name: Ash of War: Holy Ground
description: Found together with Tree Sentinel Armor set inside Auriza Hero's Grave.

name: Ash of War: Ice Spear
description: Ash of War. Dropped by the Night's Cavalry miniboss roaming near the broken bridge upon defeat. Only appears at night.

name: Ash of War: Lifesteal Fist
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab near the Caelid Highway.

name: Ash of War: Lightning Ram
description: Dropped from a Teardrop Scarab.

name: Ash of War: Lightning Slash
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the middle of an enclosed area just outside the Capital Outskirts.

name: Ash of War: Lion's Claw
description: Drops from the Lion Guardian in Fort Gael upon defeating it.

name: Ash of War: Loretta's Slash
description: Ash of War. Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta upon defeat.

name: Ash of War: Mighty Shot
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found along the road as it slopes upwards.

name: Ash of War: Phantom Slash
description: Ash of War. Dropped by the Night's Cavalry boss that spawns at night in the Forbidden Lands stretch.

name: Ash of War: Poison Moth Flight
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by the Night's Cavalry miniboss roaming the highway upon defeat. Only appears at night.

name: Ash of War: Poisonous Mist
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found in the Aeonian Swamp in Caelid

name: Ash of War: Prayerful Strike
description: On the lake under the short rocky tunnel, dropped by the invisible mob that leaves paw prints on its path.

name: Ash of War: Rain of Arrows
description: Appears at edge of a cliff after you've looted the "Redmane" Painting in Sellia, Town of Sorcery. You'll find it down the cliff on a plateau south east of the Eastern Minor Erdtree in Caelid. The Erdtree is located in the Caelid subregion called Dragonbarrow. Once you've made your way down, walk to the edge and you'll briefly see the spirit of a painter, he'll vanish and the Ash of War will appear in his place

name: Ash of War: Raptor of the Mists
description: Found after aiding Bloody Finger Hunter Yura in defeating his target in Raya Lucaria

name: Ash of War: Repeating Thrust
description: Dropped by Night's Cavalry that roams the bridge near Agheel Lake North, only appears at night.

name: Ash of War: Royal Knight's Resolve
description: Ash of War. Found on a corpse in the hallways of Volcano Manor. Accessible from the imp statue locked room in the dungeon of the manor.

name: Ash of War: Sacred Blade
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab, situated next to a noticeable whirlwind.

name: Ash of War: Sacred Order
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in Altus Plateau, just north of the Site Of Grace.

name: Ash of War: Sacred Ring of Light
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the southeast section of Aeonia Swamp.

name: Ash of War: Seppuku
description: On the frozen lake next to the "Freezing Lake" site of grace, dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab. The Scarab can be heard on the edge of the lake. Stand on his trail and wait for it to come back around and greet it with attacks.

name: Ash of War: Shared Order
description: Dropped by the Night's Cavalry

name: Ash of War: Shield Bash
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab under a bridge very close to East Gate Bridge Trestle site of grace.

name: Ash of War: Shield Crash
description: Ash of war with no affinity, dropped by a teardrop scarab in Lux Ruins, Altus Plateau.

name: Ash of War: Sky Shot
description: Ash of War. Drops from Teardrop Scarab behind Isolated Merchant's Shack

name: Ash of War: Spectral Lance
description: When you reach the end of the courtyard where it is heavily guarded by multiple Zombie Dog and Glintstone Zombies. Turn left and you'll see a path that is lit with a torch, down the slope, you'll find a Teardrop Scarab, kill it to obtain this item

name: Ash of War: Stamp (Sweep)
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Found by defeating an invisible Teardrop Scarab roaming around the beach. You will see glowing footprints appearing in a set pattern around the area. Stand in front of its path and attack as it approaches you to reveal the creature.

name: Ash of War: Storm Assault
description: Starting from the Rampart Tower grace, exit onto the ramparts where the war hawks and explosive barrels are. At the tower on the west side where the second war hawk holding an explosive barrel is, jump up onto the battlements on the north side. There is a corpse visible with an item (Marred Wooden Shield). Jumping down to the walls beneath will allow the player to get to the shield. Jumping down further will land the player on a ledge that will collapse, causing them to fall far below into some bushes. A Silver Teardrop Scarab holds the Ash of War

name: Ash of War: Storm Stomp
description: Found in the southeastern area of Gatefront Ruins. There is a set of stairs that leads to a small room with a treasure chest. This item is found alongside Whetstone Knife.

name: Ash of War: Storm Wall
description: Find a Teardrop Scarab, defeat it to obtain the Ash of War.

name: Ash of War: Stormcaller
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the northern section of the castle.

name: Ash of War: Sword Dance
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab. It can be found in the rocky area, where some Ghost Jellyfish dwell. entern a cavern-like structure.

name: Ash of War: Thops's Barrier
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found on a small isle on the western side of the lake.

name: Ash of War: Thops's Barrier (Church of Irith)
description: Ash of War. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab that spawns inside the church after Thops leaves for the academy.

name: Ash of War: Through and Through
description: Dropped by an invisible Teardrop Scarab. You will see glowing footprints appearing in a set pattern around the area. Stand in front of its path and attack as it approaches you to reveal the creature.

name: Ash of War: Troll's Roar
description: Can be found on the top of the big rock just south east the Church of Repose (in Mountaintops of the Giants)

name: Ash of War: Unsheathe
description: Can be obtained from a Teardrop Scarab located in the water. Beware of the Giant Crab nearby.

name: Ash of War: Vow of the Indomitable
description: Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab, in the southwestern swampy area.

name: Ash of War: Wild Strikes
description: Dropped from a Teardrop Scarab located in the middle of the path leading from the Stormhill Shack site of grace to the Castleward Tunnel site of grace.

name: Aspect of the Crucible: Breath
description: Incantation. Dropped by Tanith's Knight. After defeating Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy, speak with Tanith then go back to Rykard's body. If you attack her here in his boss area, her knight will invade.

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Horns
description: Incantation. Dropped by Crucible Knightfound at the bottom floor of the Rampart Tower

name: Aspects of the Crucible: Tail
description: Incantation dropped by Stormhill Evergaol's boss, Crucible Knight

name: Assassin's Cerulean Dagger
description: Dropped by the Black Knife Assassin found inside Black Knife Catacombs.

name: Assassin's Crimson Dagger
description: Dropped by Black Knife Assassin, found inside Deathtouched Catacombs.

name: Astel, Stars of Darkness
description: Boss of Yelough Anix Tunnel in Consecrated Snowfield. Drops Meteorite of Astel

name: Astray from Caelid Highway North
description: Site of Grace found by veering off the Caelid Highway towards the east.

name: Audience Pathway
description: Site of Grace found right outside Rykard's boss room. Accessed by completing all 3 assassination quests for the Volcano Manor and talking to Tanith, or completing the manor's hidden dungeon and taking the waygate.

name: Auriza Hero's Grave
description: Found by following the main path within the outskirt walls, all the way to the east.

name: Auriza Hero's Grave
description: Site of Grace found inside Auriza Hero's Grave. Right by the lift.

name: Auriza Side Tomb
description: A Catacomb east from Lyndell, for fallen Auriza warriors

name: Avenue Balcony
description: Site of Grace on Avenue Balcony.

name: Avionette Soldier Ashes
description: Located on a corpse after taking the rotating lift down in Raya Lucaria Academy

name: Axe Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in a cellar underneath the Mistwood Ruins.

name: Azur's Glintstone Staff
description: Looted on the ground inside a room that is full of crystals. It's on the east side, the second floor of the Church of the Cuckoo within Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Banished Knight Oleg Ashes
description: This Spirit is obtained after Defeating the Ulcerated Tree Sprit located within Fringefolk Hero's Grave.

name: Banished Knight's Halberd +8
description: An upgraded Banished Knight's Halberd dropped by Edgar the Revenger.

name: Barrier of Gold
description: Can be found after heading down the stairs and taking the elevator, right after the fight with Godfrey, First Elden Lord (Hoarah Loux).

name: Battle Hammer
description: Found within Murkwater Catacombs. Dropped by Grave Warden Duelist.

name: Battlemage Hugues Ashes
description: Dropped by Battlemage Hugues (boss) located in the Sellia Evergaol. The best way to reach the evergaol is to travel south east along the cliff from the Dragonbarrow West site of grace. It will be on top of a plateau overlooking Aeonia Swamp.

name: Battlemage Set
description: The entire set drops from a particular Battlemage enemy, located east of West Windmill Pasture, on a hill near the northern end of the collapsed bridge.

name: Beast Champion Set
description: Complete Beast Champion Armor Set, dropped by Recusant Bernahl when defeated. Altered Chest Piece.

name: Beast Clergyman / Maliketh, The Black Blade
description: This Bossfight constitutes the final stage of the Crumbling Farum Azula zone. The fight starts against Beast Clergyman but it is revealed mid-fight whis was Maliketh, The Black Blade.

name: Beast Crest Heater Shield
description: A large shield kept inside a chest at a camp.

name: Beastman of Farum Azula (Dragonbarrow Cave)
description: Duo Boss encounter against two beastmen at the end of Dragonbarrow Cave. One wielding a Greatsword and one wielding Throwing Knives. Drops the Flamedrake Talisman +2 upon defeat.

name: Beastman of Farum Azula (Groveside Cave)
description: Optional Boss. Found at the end of the Groveside Cave mini-dungeon. Drops the Flamedrake Talisman.

name: Behind Caria Manor
description: Site of Grace in the plateau behind Caria Manor. Accessible only after defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Behind the Castle
description: Site of Grace found by taking the ladder at the back of the main courtyard to the top level. Follow the path ahead, past the harpies and then drop down the broken section of the wall on the right.

name: Bell Bearing Hunter
description: This NPC invades at NIGHT, replacing Knight Bernahl. You have to travel here from another site of grace to trigger it. Drops Bone Peddler's Bell Bearing

name: Bell Bearing Hunter
description: Invading NPC miniboss that spawns only at night.

name: Bell Bearing Hunter (Church of Vows)
description: Field Boss. Found at the Church of Vows during night time. Alternatively, you can spawn him by advancing to night, resting at the grace once more and then advancing to morning. Drops the Meat Peddler's Bell Bearing

name: Bell Bearing Hunter (Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow)
description: Field Boss. Found outside the shack at night time, where the merchant usually sits. Drops the Gravity Stone Peddler's Bell Bearing upon defeat.

name: Bellum Church
description: Located past the ruins and the forested area guarded by Mounted Knights.

name: Bellum Church (Site of Grace)
description: Right outside the entrance to Bellum Church

name: Bernahl (First Location)
description: Bernahl, Location 1. Tarnished Knight NPC found at the Warmaster's Shack. Sells various Ashes of War. Moves to the Volcano Manor in Mt. Gelmir.

name: Bernahl (Second Location)
description: Bernahl, Location 2. Merchant and Quest NPC. Sells Ashes of War.

name: Beside the Crater-Pocked Glade
description: Site of Grace found near a forested area.

name: Beside the Great Bridge
description: A Site of Grace located in Crumbling Farum Azula.

name: Beside the Rampart Gaol
description: Site of Grace found at the back of the castle, at the lower level.

name: Bestial Constitution
description: Found by killing a golden scarab along the cliffside North East of the Minor Erdtree in Caelid

name: Bestial Sanctum
description: Site of Grace found inside the Bestial Sanctum.

name: Bestial Sanctum
description: Bestial Sanctum, Gurranq, Beast Clergyman can be found inside.

name: Black Blade Kindred
description: Boss found at the entrance of the Bestial Sanctum. Drops Gargoyle's Blackblade and Gargoyle's Black Halberd

name: Black Blade Kindred B
description: Black Blade Kindred is massive gargoyle that wields a huge halberd and appears in multiple locations.

name: Black Bow
description: Bow that can be found on the roof on the right that overlooks the area. Need to jump from roof to roof in order to reach it.

name: Black Flame Ritual
description: Incantation. Dropped by the Godskin Apostle & Godskin Noble upon their defeat in the Spiritcaller's Cave.

name: Black Hood
description: In the Sage's Cave, in a treasure chest behind an illusory wall.

name: Black Knife
description: Dagger dropped from the Black Knife Assassin

name: Black Knife Assassin
description: Field Boss. Can be found inside the Deathtouched Catacombs. Drops Assassin's Crimson Dagger.

name: Black Knife Assassin (Altus Plateau)
description: Optional boss found at the entrance of Sainted Hero's Grave. Drops Black Knife

name: Black Knife Assassin (Liurnia of the Lakes East)
description: Miniboss of the Black Knife Catacombs. Drops Assassin's Cerulean Dagger

name: Black Knife Assassin (Sage's Cave)
description: Secret boss within Sage's Cave. Drops Concealing Veil talisman.

name: Black Knife Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found at the top of the Black Knife Catacombs

name: Black Knife Catacombs
description: Black Knife Catacombs homes many skeletons and crabs within its depths, find and defeat the Black Knife Assassin within to obtain their dagger

name: Black Knife Set
description: Full Set found under an arch. Includes Black Knife Hood, Black Knife Armor, Black Knife Gauntlets and Black Knife Greaves.

name: Black Knife Tiche
description: Spirit Ashes. Dropped by Alecto, Black Knife Ringleader upon defeat.

name: Black Wolf Mask
description: This mask can be found on the wall behind Seluvis's Rise.

name: Blackguard  (Second Location)
description: Merchant. He appears here if you bought Rya's Necklace and Boiled Prawn

name: Blackguard Big Boggart
description: Merchant who sells an item for Rya's quest and can also be summoned for the Magma Wyrm boss fight.

name: Blaidd (1st location)
description:
Blaidd's First Location: When visiting Mistwood, the player can occasionally hear a wolf howl. At this point, they can ask Merchant Kale about the howling. The merchant will teach the player the Finger Snap gesture.
Blaidd can be seen resting on the tallest point in the Mistwood Ruins, and will jump down after the player uses the gesture while standing below him. Blaidd will tell the player he is searching for a man who goes by the name Darriwil.

name: Blaidd (2nd Location)
description:
Blaidd's Second Encounter. Darriwil can be fought at the Forlorn Hound Evergaol, where Blaidd will become available as a summon. Speak to Blaidd again after the fight.
Talking to Blaidd once will yield a Somber Smithing stone [2]. Talk to him a second time and he will mention a blacksmith along the Road to the Manor in Liurnia, and instruct the player to say that "Blaidd sent them". Doing this will unlock the Carian Filigreed Crest in the blacksmith's shop.
If the Evergaol fight was completed before meeting Blaidd, he will still be available to speak to here after the player talks to him in the Mistwood Ruins.

name: Blaidd (Ranni's Quest - Second Location)
description: NPC, appears awaiting for the festival after you meet him at Siofra River

name: Blaidd (Spectral)
description: Quest NPC. Appears in spectral form on the first floor after speaking to Ranni for the first time.

name: Blasphemous Claw
description: Dropped by the invasor Recusant Bernahl when defeated.

name: Blessed Dew Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in a chest west of the Divine Bridge Site of Grace. Guarded by a Golem.

name: Blessing of the Erdtree
description: Found lying on a giant furniture, located in the middle of the room.

name: Blood Grease
description: Consumable Item. Two can be found by a grave with a wooden pole next to it.

name: Bloodflame Blade
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab along the marshes outside of the nearby island. Note that there is another scarab nearby that does not drop anything.

name: Bloodhound Claws
description: Claw. Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight in the secret passage of Volcano Manor.

name: Bloodhound Knight
description: Found within Lakeside Crystal Cave. Drops Cerulean Amber Medallion

name: Bloodhound Knight Darriwil
description: Boss of Forlorn Hound Evergaol. Drops the Bloodhound's Fang Curved Greatsword

name: Bloodhound Knight Floh
description: Dropped by the Red Wolf of the Champion

name: Bloodhound Knight Set
description: Dropped by the Bloodhound Knight guarding the Gelmir Knight Set pickup. The set must then be picked up from the corpse of the Knight.

name: Bloodhound's Fang
description: Curved Greatsword. Dropped by the boss of Forlorn Hound Evergaol, Bloodhound Knight Darriwil.

name: Bloodrose
description: Can be found inside the Deathtouched Catacombs. On a body, against a wall, past a big hall with many Skeletons.

name: Bloodstained Dagger
description: Dropped by Demihuman chief/Demihuman assassin sleeping before the wooden bridge leading to the minor eldtree in the weeping peninsula.

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura
description: First encounter with this NPC, warns you about the dragon in the nearby ruins.

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura (Fourth Location)
description: Found at the Second Church of Marika.

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura (Second Location)
description: NPC Questline: Found on the ground level under a broken structure. Talk to Bloody Finger Hunter Yura by resting at a grace after defeating NPC invader Bloody Finger Nerijus.

name: Bloody Finger Hunter Yura (Third Location)
description: He can be found requesting aid from the player in the form of a Red Summon Sign on the bridge north of the Main Gate Grace. Walk past the magic seal to find. Enter his world and defeat Bloody Finger Ravenmount Assassin. Afterward, talk to Yura who will be standing against the railing near to where his summon sign was

name: Bloody Finger Nerijus
description: Found while traversing the Murkwater River. Blood Finger Hunter Yura joins to aid you during the fight.

name: Bloody Finger Okina
description: NPC Invader. Deals powerful blows with his Katana. Drops Rivers of Blood upon defeat.

name: Bloody Finger Ravenmount Assassin
description: Technically you are the invader of an NPC called "Bloody Finger Ravenmount Assassin".

name: Bloody Helice
description: Can be found inside a chest, in the same room of the boss in Writheblood Ruins

name: Blue Dancer Charm
description: Dropped by the Guardian Golem within Highroad Cave

name: Blue-Feathered Branchsword
description: Talisman. Dropped from miniboss that only spawns at night: Deathbird (Stormhill)

name: Blue-White Wooden Shield
description: Can be found on the outskirts of the buildings, towards the west side.

name: Boc the Seamster (Fifth Location)
description: Found at the Altus Highway Junction site of grace

name: Boc the Seamster (First Location)
description: Location 1. Roaming around this location, you will hear someone call out. Look for a small group of trees and attack the small yellow tree to dispel the illusion and reveal Boc. Awards Mushroom x10 after speaking to him twice.

name: Boc the Seamster (Fourth Location)
description: NPC. He can be found kneeling by the East Raya Lucaria Gate Site of Grace (southwest most point of the Bellum Road). You have to rest at this Site of Grace for him to appear.

name: Boc the Seamster (Second Location)
description: Boc the Seamster Location 2. After meeting him for the first time, Boc will move into the Coastal Cave. You will find him writhing on the ground next to the Site of Grace.

name: Boc the Seamster (Sixth Location)
description: Boc appears in the East Capital Rampart site of grace. You have to rest at this Site of Grace for him to appear. He offers his sewing services as well as makes some conversation regarding the Erdtree.

name: Boc the Seamster (Third Location)
description: Boc the Seamster Location 3. After meeting him for the second time, Boc will move to Liurnia of the Lakes. Find him kneeling by the Lake-Facing Site of Grace, a cliff above to the entrance to Stillwater Cave.

name: Boilprawn Shack
description: A shack in Liurnia of the Lakes where players can meet Blackguard Big Boggart

name: Bols, Carian Knight
description: Optional Boss. Imprisoned within the Cuckoo's Evergaol. Drops the Greatblade Phalanx spell upon defeat.

name: Boltdrake Talisman
description: Talisman. Found on a corpse sitting against a tall brazier.

name: Boltdrake Talisman +1
description: An upgraded version of the Boltdrake Talisman. Found in a storage shed inside the Old Altus Tunnel dungeon.

name: Borealis the Freezing Fog
description: Optional Boss. Drops Dragon Heart.

name: Bower of Bounty
description: Site of grace in the middle of the forest.

name: Brass Shield
description: Found southeast of the map in Limgrave. Head southeast from the Agheel Lake South site of grace, head to the top of a cliff and you'll see a statue of an object that looks like the half piece of a bowl or a circle. Face the other way, to see a Knight. Defeat it to obtain a Brass Shield.

name: Briar Greatshield
description: Dropped by Elemer of the Briar

name: Briars of Punishment
description: Incantation. Found at the leftmost dead tree next to three Lesser Fire Monks just before the long stone bridge with the Golem Archer at the end in the Mountaintops of the Giants region

name: Briars of Sin
description: Liurnia of the Lakes: Dropped by a mob directly north-west from the Artists Shack. Jump across the rocks and they'll be by a group of fire slugs.

name: Brick Hammer
description: Can be found on the 3rd floor. It is  in a corpse dangling from a window.You have to access from the 4th floor, using the wooden platforms outside.

name: Bridge of Sacrifice
description: A large stone bridge connecting Limgrave to the Weeping Peninsula. Lots of enemy soldiers and ballistae around.

name: Bridge of Sacrifice
description: Site of Grace found on the Weeping Peninsula end of the Bridge of Sacrifice.

name: Brother Corhyn (First Location)
description: Found at the side of the road after he leaves Roundtable Hold.

name: Brother Corhyn (Fourth Location)
description: NPC, found at the south of Stargazer's Ruins

name: Brother Corhyn (Second Location)
description: Brother Corhyn moves to Goldmask's location if you tell him about finding Goldmask first. His incantation inventory will increase at this location

name: Brother Corhyn (Third Location)
description: NPC, found contemplating a riddle alongside Goldmask

name: Bull-Goat Set
description: Armor Set. Dropped by Great Horned Tragoth after successfully invading his world.

name: Bull-Goat's Talisman
description: Talisman. Found on a corpse inside Dragonbarrow Cave.

name: Butchering Knife
description: Greataxe. Dropped by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater.

name: Caelem Ruins
description: Site of Grace found by the main road near some ruins.

name: Caelem Ruins
description: Ruins found on the western portion of Caelid, where the Caelid Highway cuts through.

name: Caelid Catacombs
description: Found due East from the Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

name: Caelid Highway South
description: Site of Grace found by the Caelid Highway bend towards the south.

name: Caelid Waypoint Ruins
description: A set of ruins found in the southwest of Caelid, along the highway.

name: Callu Baptismal Church
description: Church ruins found just south of Ailing Village. Inhabited by a lot of rats and one giant rat monster.

name: Candletree Wooden Shield
description: In the Sage's Cave, in a chest behind an illusory wall.

name: Cane Sword
description: West Capital Ramparts Site of Grace, Go south out of the room with the site of grace and down the flight of stairs to the floor underneath, make a complete U-turn in the room with the stairs to find a corpse with the sword

name: Cannon of Haima
description: Found in the Chest at the top of the tower past the sealed area.

name: Capital Outskirts
description: Site of grace within the proximities of Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Capital Rampart
description: Site of grace on the eastern side of the Capital.

name: Caria Manor
description: A major dungeon comprised of a very large estate, overlooking the lakes from the north. Its eternal warden, Royal Knight Loretta fervently guards the manor.

name: Carian Glintblade Staff
description: Staff. Found on the top floor of the Highway Lookout Tower.

name: Carian Glintstone Staff
description: Found at the Carian Study Hall.

name: Carian Inverted Statue
description: Quest Item. Given by Ranni after giving her the Fingerslayer Blade.

name: Carian Knight Set
description: The Carian Knight Set can be picked up next to a large tombstone, past the graveyard section of Raya Lucaria Academy. When you reach the gate entrance leading to the large rotating lift, make a hard right and look below the ledge, jump down and follow the narrow path where you'll see a group of Glintstone Zombies worshipping a tombstone.

name: Carian Knight's Shield
description: Dropped by Moongrum Carian Knight.

name: Carian Knight's Sword
description: Straight Sword. Found in a chest at the back of a large stagecoach being pulled by 2 Trolls.

name: Carian Piercer
description: Sorcery. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab behind the gardens near the east.

name: Carian Study Hall
description: A large library-like location full of spectres and magic users that leads to the Divine Tower of Liurnia. Using the Carian Inverted Statue unlocks an alternative version of the map.

name: Castellan's Hall
description: Site of Grace that shows up after defeating the Boss in The Shaded Castle

name: Castle Morne
description: Optional Dungeon. A large castle on the southern tip of the Weeping Peninsula. The Leonine Misbegotten boss can be found here.

name: Castle Morne Lift
description: Site of Grace found at the entrance of Castle Morne, before ascending the lift.

name: Castle Morne Rampart
description: Site of Grace found near a campfire.

name: Castle Sol
description: A minor dungeon found in northeast Mountaintops of the Giants. Stronghole of Commander Niall.

name: Castle Sol Main Gate
description: Site of Grace found by the castle's western entrance.

name: Castle Sol Rooftop
description: Site of Grace found in Commander Niall's arena after defeating him.

name: Cathedral of Dragon Communion
description: Special Dragon Communion altar can be used to trade Dragon Hearts for Draconic Incantations.

name: Cathedral of Manus Celes
description: Located at South West Liurnia of The Lakes. Accessible only after making significant progress in Ranni's questline.

name: Cathedral of Manus Celes
description: Site of Grace found in the center of the Cathedral of Manus Celes

name: Cathedral of the Forsaken
description: Subterranean site of grace. In the room where you fight Mohg, The Omen

name: Cave of Knowledge
description: Site of grace located inside the Cave of Knowledge

name: Cave of the Forlorn
description: Located south of the Minor Erdtree in Consecrated Snowfield

name: Celebrant's Skull
description: Warhammer. Found on a corpse at the cliff directly north from Windmill village site of grace

name: Cemetery Shade
description: Found inside Tombsward Catacombs. Drops Lhutel the Headless

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion
description: Talisman dropped by Bloodhound Knight, the miniboss of Lakeside Crystal Cave

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +1
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found on a corpse hanging by a wooden ledge above the southern walls of the castle. This area is accessed by climbing a ladder behind the church in the southeast and following the walls west. Beware the very powerful dual sword knight guarding the area. He can teleport behind you and perform very long combos.

name: Cerulean Amber Medallion +2
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found in an underground room in the northwest section of the Lunar Estate Ruins. The entrance is sealed by both an Imp Statue that requires 1 Stonesword Key, as well as an illusory floor that can be dispelled with an attack.

name: Cerulean Crystal Tear A
description: Dropped by Erdtree Avatar.

name: Cerulean Crystal Tear B
description: Physick Flask material. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding this tree.

name: Cerulean Hidden Tear
description: Flask of Wondrous Physick Upgrade. Dropped by the Ulcerated Tree Spirit.

name: Cerulean Seed Talisman
description: Found at Carian Study Hall. look for it at the rafters, next to a body.

name: Cerulean Tear Scarab
description: Helmet. Found on a corpse on the roof of a building. Accessible by jumping across the rooftops.

name: Chair-Crypt of Sellia
description: Site of Grace found in the chamber of the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest boss duo. Accessible after defeating them.

name: Champion's Song Painting
description: Champion's Song painting found in a small wooden structure on the side of the walls in The Shaded Castle

name: Chapel of Anticipation
description: The starting building players are placed in after the game introduction.

name: Chapel of Anticipation Waygate
description: A Teleporter Waygate at The Four Belfries that transports you to the Chapel of Anticipation. The same location you begin the game in. Requires an Imbued Sword Key.

name: Chelona's Rise
description: A tower found in the very corner of the upper plateau in Liurnia's southwest. This tower is initially sealed, with an imp statue at the entrance holding a glowing book, instructing you to "seek three great wise beasts". See the tower's page for details.

name: Chelona's Rise Turtle Marker 1
description: Giant Ghostly Turtle #1. One of three required to break the seal to Chelona's Rise. Found hanging off the side of the cliffs west of the tower.

name: Chelona's Rise Turtle Marker 2
description: Giant Ghostly Turtle #2. One of three required to break the seal to Chelona's Rise. Found sitting on a lower cliff south of Lunar Estate Ruins. Head to the edge of the plateau and look down. You can hit the turtle with a ranged attack from here.

name: Chelona's Rise Turtle Marker 3
description: Giant Ghostly Turtle #3. One of three required to break the seal to Chelona's Rise. Found flying high above in the air southeast of Ringleader's Evergaol. You can use a bow to hit it or use the Spiritspring nearby to jump with Torrent and hit it while in the air.

name: Chief Guardian Arghanthy
description: NPC Mini-Boss, attacks with quick Fire spells. Drops One-Eyed Shield when defeated.

name: Chrysalids' Memento
description: Key Quest Item. Found on top of the pile of corpses surrounded by Skeletal Dogs inside the Many Armed Key Master's fortress. This room is adjacent to the boss room.

name: Church of Dragon Communion
description: The ruins of a church where dragon rituals were performed. The most prominent sight here is the corpse of a large white dragon laying amongst the ruins. There is also an altar where you can obtain powerful Incantations in exchange for Dragon Heart offerings.

name: Church of Dragon Communion
description: Site of Grace just outside of the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Church of Elleh
description: Ruins of an Old Church. There is a Merchant and a Smithing Table in the area.

name: Church of Elleh
description: Site of Grace found within the ruins of the Church of Elleh.

name: Church of Inhibition
description: The remnants of an old church in the north of Liurnia, just before the Altus Plateau.

name: Church of Irith
description: It can be easily found as it is located on a very open field.

name: Church of Pilgrimage
description: Church ruins found atop cliffs in the northern section of Weeping Peninsula.

name: Church of Pilgrimage
description: Site of Grace found at the Church of Pilgrimage.

name: Church of Repose
description: Church found high in the mountains. There is a site of grace and a Sacred Tear inside.

name: Church of Repose (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace found inside the Church of Ripose

name: Church of the Cuckoo
description: Site of Grace at the hall to the right of the altar.

name: Church of the Eclipse
description: Site of Grace found in the Church in the southeast corner of the castle. The church is accessed by heading up the wooden platform in the courtyard and following the path in the middle levels.

name: Church of the Plague
description: Abandoned church overcome by the decay of rot that pollutes Caelid.

name: Church of the Plague
description: Site of grace found within the Church of the Plague

name: Church of Vows
description: Church of Vows is a forgotten church guarded by Miriel, Pastor of Vows.

name: Church of Vows
description: Church of Vows Site of Grace. Located at Church of Vows prior to the main entrance.

name: Cinquedea
description: Dagger. Found outside the bestial sanctum, after a long series of platforms starting on the west side to drop down onto the external structure's base.

name: Clarifying Boluses
description: Found on the upper platform where there are some enemies.

name: Claw Talisman
description: Talisman. Found on a corpse atop a tower accessible by ladder. The tower has several none-hostile Eagles at the top.

name: Claymore
description: Greatsword. From the main courtyard entrance, hug the right wall past the burning corpses and harpies to reach the entrance to the building in the north. The sword is found in a chest to the left as you enter.

name: Cleanrot Knight
description: Optional Boss found at the end of the Stillwater Cave. Drops the Winged Sword Insignia upon defeat.

name: Cleanrot Knight Duo (Abandoned Cave)
description: Duo Boss Fight at the end of the Abandoned Cave. Drops the Gold Scarab talisman upon defeat.

name: Cleanrot Knight Finlay Ashes
description: Located in a chest protected by a knight in Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. From the Prayer Room site of grace, head straight down a few sets of stairs until you reach a small landing where two crossbow guards are stationed above. Jump over the railing on the landing onto the angled brace, then jump onto the platform with the gazebo. The ashes are in a chest in a room next to the gazebo.

name: Cliffbottom Catacombs
description: Catacombs found at the bottom of the cliffs in the eastern side of the Liurnia of the Lakes region, now infested by Imps and Ogres

name: Cliffbottom Catacombs
description: Site of grace at the entrance of the Cliffbottom Catacombs.

name: Cloth Garb
description: Can be found at the chest at the end of the dungeon in Murkwater Cave

name: Cloth Trousers
description: Can be found at the chest at the end of the dungeon in Murkwater Cave

name: Coastal Cave
description: A dark and humid cavern home to the Demi-Human Chief boss. Must be completed to access the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Coastal Cave
description: Site of Grace found inside Coastal Cave, near the beginning.

name: Coded Sword
description: Found in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Look for an abandoned horse stable, then climb onto its roof and enter the building. Keep going until you find a broken round table. Look for the double door. Inside that room you will find the coded sword.

name: Coil Shield
description: Located on a body in Volcano Cave, northeast of the Ninth Mt. Gelmir Campsite in Mt. Gelmir. You will need to drop down a hole and then double back.

name: Collapsing Stars
description: Looted from a chest located at the War-Dead Catacombs. In the room with the enemies fighting each other, drop down to the lower level filled with scarlet rot and look for the chest. This catacomb is located in the northmost edge of Starscourge Radahn arena after beating him, just south of Lenne's Rise.

name: Comet
description: Found behind an Illusory Wall before the Debate Hall Site of Grace.

name: Comet Azur
description: Sorcery. Acquired from Primeval Sorcerer Azur.

name: Commander Niall
description: Great Enemy. Found in the northeast of the castle, accessible by using the eastern exit of the church and going through the building there.

name: Commander O'Neil
description: Great Enemy. Drops Commander's Standard and Unalloyed Gold Needle

name: Commander's Standard
description: Halberd. Dropped by Commander O'Neil upon defeat.

name: Commoner's Simple Garb
description: Chest Armor. Found on a corpse on the balcony accessible from the Gateside Chamber Site of Grace.

name: Concealing Veil
description: Talisman dropped by the Black Knife Assassin boss within Sage's Cave

name: Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Hidden by the snowstorm, Catacombs with valuable Grave Glovewort materials 8, 9 and Great Grave Glovewort.

name: Consort's Set
description: Armor Set. Dropped by Tanith's Knight. After defeating Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy, speak with Tanith then go back to Rykard's body. If you attack her here in his boss area, her knight will invade.

name: Conspectus Scroll
description: Looted off a body inside a room. From the Schoolhouse Classroom site of Raya Lucaria Academy, go to the hallway, turn left. You'll see the corpse in front a an illusory wall.

name: Converted Fringe Tower
description: Tower found on the Fringe, a puzzle seals the rest of the Tower.

name: Converted Tower
description: An abandoned tower, with a few secrets to loot.

name: Converted Tower (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace by the Converted Tower.

name: Corpse-Stench Shack
description: A small shack in northern Mt. Gelmir.

name: Crab Eggs
description: Found on a body located on the edge. Beware of the small skeleton army you have to face before.

name: Crab Eggs (B)
description: Found on a body underneath a broken cart next to a burnt out campfire and a small red tent.

name: Cracked Crystal - X1 MORNE TUNNEL
description: One can be looted off a Miner enemy on the left side of the small shack in Morne Tunnel.

name: Cracked Pot
description: Special Tool Key Item. Found on the cliffs overlooking the gardens below.

name: Cracked Pot (B)
description: Found inside a room in the northern area, where you fight the Leyndell Royal Guard.

name: Cracked Pot - 3x Jarburg
description: Crafting Pot. Three can be found in the village of Jarburg. The first is on a corpse in front of the blocked door of a hut north of where you drop down into the village. The second is in a hut northeast of the first. The last Cracked Pot is found on a large headstone in the south along the main road in the village.

name: Cracked Pot - Minor Erdtree (Caelid)
description: Crafting Pot. One found at the end of a tree branch extending from the northwest cliffs behind the tree.

name: Craftsman's Shack
description: A series of wooden huts found directly south of the volcano.

name: Craftsman's Shack
description: Site of Grace found inside the Craftsman's Shack.

name: Cranial Vessel Candlestand
description: Warhammer. Found inside the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave on a corpse at the end of the large hall locked behind an Imp Statue barrier. This is directly above the room with the flamethrower pillar.

name: Crepus's Vial
description: Talisman. Dropped by Rileigh the Idle after successfully invading his world.

name: Crimson Amber Medallion +1
description: Talisman. Found at the top of a room locked behind an imp statue in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: Crimson Amber Medallion +2
description: By falling down the sewers gate, on the beam below, just before fully entering the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds

name: Crimson Bubbletear
description: Physick Flask material. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding this tree.

name: Crimson Crystal Tear
description: A crystal mixed to enhance the effects of the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Located in front of the statue in Third Church of Marika.

name: Crimson Crystal Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Found on an altar at the base of the Minor Erdtree in Capital Outskirts. Guarded by enemies.

name: Crimson Hood
description: Roderika's questline must be completed and spirit tuning must be unlocked for this item to appear on top of the pile of corpses.

name: Crimson Seed Talisman
description: In locked imp's room in Sainted Hero's Grave.

name: Crimsonburst Crystal Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar boss upon defeat.

name: Crimsonspill Crystal Tear
description: Flask Upgrade. Dropped by Wormface

name: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear
description: On a cliff ledge south of Giants' Gravepost (above the grace point, the ledge is accessed by going north-east from the Foot of the Forge grace point, Just follow the edge of the cliff until you see the path going above Giant's Gravepost).

name: Cross-Naginata
description: Spear. Found on a corpse inside the Gael Tunnel, in the cavern filled with Land Octopi and a single Giant Land Octopus.

name: Crucible Axe Set
description: Dropped by Crucible Knight Ordovis Boss. It contains: Crucible Axe Armor, Crucible Axe Helm, Crucible Gauntlets and Crucible Greaves.

name: Crucible Knight
description: Found within Stormhill Evergaol, this is a solo fight without Spirit Ashes or player summons. Drops the Incantation Aspects of the Crucible: Tail

name: Crucible Knight & Crucible Knight Ordovis
description: Dual Bossfight against Crucible Knight and Crucible Knight Ordovis.

name: Crucible Knot Talisman
description: Dropped by Omenkiller, located in the Village of the Albinaurics

name: Crumbling Beast Grave Depths
description: This Site of Grace is right next to the Farum Azula Dragon that you encounter in the bridge, the dragon can be easily skipped to reach this site of grace.

name: Crumbling Farum Azula
description: Reached by talking to Melina by the Site of Grace at the Forge of the Giants in Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Crumbling Farum Azula Waygate
description: A Teleporter Waygate that transports you to the Crumbling Farum Azula. Requires an Imbued Sword Key.

name: Crystal Bud
description: Within Ravine-Veiled Village, near Site of Grace.

name: Crystal Bud - 2x - Liurnia Lake Shore
description: Found within the proximities of the Liurnia Lake Shore Site of Grace.

name: Crystal Burst
description: Drops from the Demi-Human Queen mini-boss in the Demi-Human Forest Ruins

name: Crystal Dart
description: Offensive Consumable. Found on a gravestone in the western portion of the upper manor.

name: Crystal Dart B
description: Looted off a corpse on the broken beam connected to the stars of the Iron ball trap.

name: Crystal Dart C
description: Looted off a corpse found the second room on the right, where multiple crystal snails can be found.

name: Crystal Dart x4
description: Found on a body being devoured by Rotten Strays in the Consecrated Snowfield

name: Crystal Knife
description: Dagger. Found in a chest inside the storage room in the Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel protected by Marionettes.

name: Crystal Release
description: Sorcery Spell. Dropped by the Crystalians duo bosses inside the Academy Crystal Cave upon their defeat.

name: Crystal Spear
description: Can be found inside Sellia Hideaway. It can be found in a chest behind a hidden wall, to the left of the boss room.

name: Crystal Staff
description: Crystal Staff can be found in Academy Crystal Cave. It's in a room guarded by a sorcerer behind a fog wall, located right before the boss gate. The path to the chest containing the staff is through an illusory rock wall on the left side of the tunnel, just before the stone archway.

name: Crystal Sword
description: Can be found at Village of the Albinaurics. Past the well and the wooden bridge, on a body near the edge.

name: Crystal Torrent
description: Dropped by Crystalians Trio boss in Sellia Hideaway

name: Crystalian (Ring Blade)
description: Optional Boss. Found at the bottom-most level of Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel. Drops Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing (1).

name: Crystalians
description: Duo Field Bosses. Found at the end of the Academy Crystal Cave. Drops the Crystal Release sorcery spell upon defeat.

name: Crystalians (Altus Plateau)
description: Duo Field Bosses. Drop Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (2)

name: Crystalians (Trio - Sellia Hideaway)
description: Miniboss Trio fight against Putrid Crystalian's. Crystalian (Spear), Crystalian (Ringblade) & Crystalian (Staff). Damage received from all attacks builds Scarlet Rot. Drop Crystal Torrent

name: Crystalline Woods
description: Site of Grace found by the Crystalline Woods.

name: Cuckoo Glintstone (A)
description: Found on a dead body, against a wall. Beware of the group of Soldiers.

name: Cuckoo Glintstone (B)
description: Inside the Academy Crystal Cave. On the room full of Sages, turn to the right. It is against the wall.

name: Cuckoo Glintstone (C)
description: Pillage from the body near the golden tree.

name: Cuckoo Glintstone (D)
description: Crafting Material. 10 x found in a chest inside a large enemy outpost.

name: Cuckoo Glintstone (E)
description: Crafting Material. Found on the body of the soldier shot to death by the surrounding Marionette Soldiers.

name: Cuckoo's Evergaol
description: Evergaol located on the western landmass of Liurnia. Bols, Carian Knight is imprisoned within.

name: Cursemark of Death
description: Key Item. Found on a body lying at the top of the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

name: Curved Sword Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in a chest inside the room with the Banished Knight.

name: D, Hunter of the Dead
description: D can be found mourning a person dead at his feet. Here, he will warn you against going any further east towards Summonwater Village.

name: D, Hunter of the Dead (Second Location)
description: Players should go to Summonwater Village and defeat the Tibia Mariner boss there, then return to D at the Rountable Hold to continue his quest. He will give you directions to go to the Bestial Sanctum in Caelid. You can teleport there without having to explore by going to the "Sending Gate" in East Limgrave

name: Dagger
description: Looted from a Foot Soldier upon defeat.

name: Dark Moon Greatsword
description: Greatsword. Found below the Cathedral of Manus Celes after progressing Ranni's questline.

name: Dark Moon Ring
description: Quest Item. Found in a locked chest next to the Raya Lucaria Grand Library Site of Grace. Unlocked using the Discarded Palace Key.

name: Death Rite Bird (Caelid Swamp)
description: Only spawns at night. East from the Southern Aeonia Swamp Bank site of grace, before Sellia Gateway. It drops the Death's Poker Greatsword

name: Death Rite Bird (Central Mountaintops of the Giants)
description: Optional Boss. A large Skeletal Bird found north of Stargazer's Ruins. Drops the Death Ritual Spear upon defeat.

name: Death Rite Bird (Raya Lucaria Academy East)
description: Death Rite Bird Miniboss that spawns only at night, south from the Gate Town North site of grace. Drops Ancient Death Rancor.

name: Death Rite Bird (West Mountaintops of the Giants)
description: Found at the head of the frozen river, just southeast of the Apostate Derelict at night

name: Death Ritual Spear
description: Spear. Dropped by the Death Rite Bird boss upon defeat.

name: Death's Poker
description: Greatsword. Dropped by miniboss Deathbird that appears only at night.

name: Deathbed Dress
description: Found on the bed in the building with the Lower Capital Church grace alonside the Lionel's Set

name: Deathbird (Leyndell Capital Outskirts)
description: East of the Hermit Merchant's Shack. It drops the Twinbird Kite Shield.

name: Deathbird (Liurnia of the Lakes South)
description: Only spawns at night. North east of the Scenic Isle site of grace in Liurnia under the ruin wall. It drops the Red-Feathered Branchsword

name: Deathbird (Stormhill)
description: Appears only at night. East of Warmaster's Shack just over the cliff. It drops the Blue-Feathered Branchsword

name: Deathbird (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Spawns only at night, drops the Sacrificial Axe

name: Deathroot
description: Inside Deathtouched Catacombs. Found on a chest behind the Black Knife Assassin.

name: Deathroot
description: Key Item. Obtained upon defeating the Tibia Mariner.

name: Deathroot (B)
description: Dropped by the Tibia Mariner Boss.

name: Deathroot - Gelmir's Hero Grave
description: Found inside a chest, located in the same room where you fight the Red Wolf of the Champion

name: Deathroot C
description: Deathroot dropped by Tibia Mariner located at Liurnia of the Lakes

name: Deathtouched Catacombs
description: Located west of Saintsbridge, a door with a grieving spirit beside it.

name: Deathtouched Catacombs
description: Site of grace just inside Deathtouched Catacombs.

name: Debate Hall Site of Grace
description: Site of Grace found on the third floor of the Schoolhouse Classroom building. Available to use after defeating the boss Red Wolf of Radagon.

name: Decaying Ekzykes
description: Optional Boss. Found guarding the Caelid Highway South.

name: Dectus Medallion (Left)
description: Key Quest Item. Found in a chest that can be reached by climbing the ladder in the tallest tower of Fort Haight.

name: Dectus Medallion (Right)
description: Key Quest Item. Found in a chest atop the eastern tower in Fort Faroth, accessible via ladder past all the bats on the bottom level.

name: Deep Ainsel Well
description: A small structure that houses a lift that takes players back underground to Astel, Naturalborn of the Void's boss room.

name: Deep Siofra Well
description: A small structure that houses a lift that takes players underground to the northern section of the Siofra River.

name: Deep Siofra Well
description: Site of Grace found outside of the Deep Siofra Well.

name: Demi-Human Ashes
description: Found within Impaler's Catacombs. Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog

name: Demi-Human Chief
description: Optional Boss. A duo of Demi-Human bosses found deep within the Coastal Cave. Required to defeat in order to access the Church of Dragon Communion location. Drops the Tailoring Tools and Sewing Needle key items upon defeat.

name: Demi-human Forest Ruins
description: Demi-Humans congregate here to worship their queen. Defeating her will reward players with the Demi-Human Queen's Staff, which is excellent for beginner mages.

name: Demi-Human Queen Gilika
description: Field boss found inside the Lux Ruins

name: Demi-Human Queen Maggie
description: Optional Boss. Found in the northeast section of Hermit Village. Drops a Memory Stone and Golden Rune (1) upon defeat.

name: Demi-Human Queen Margot
description: Optional Field Boss. Found in the lowest level of the Volcano Cave.

name: Demi-Human Queen's Staff
description: Dropped by the Demi-Human Queen elite enemy in Demi-Human Forest Ruins.

name: Depraved Perfumer Carmaan Ashes
description: Spirit Ash. Found behind a hidden room in the secret passageway of Volcano Manor. After heading in the secret passage, before going downstairs, turn left and go through the hallway full of snails. At the dead end where you get the cookbook, smack the left wall to reveal the hidden room.

name: Deserter's Cookbook (2)
description: Found in a small ruined house in Dragon-Burnt Ruins, guarded by Dogs and Rats

name: Devourer's Scepter
description: Dropped by Recusant Bernahl when defeated.

name: Dexterity-knot Crystal Tear
description: Physick Flask Material. Found inside a stone receptacle on top of a craggy hill.

name: Diallos
description: NPC. He leaves the Roundtable Hold and then be found over the corpse of Lanya.

name: Digger's Staff
description: Drops from Stonediggers at Raya Lucaria Crystal Tunnel.

name: Divine Bridge
description: Site of Grace found on the Leyndell Divine Bridge.

name: Divine Bridge Waygate
description: Waygate. Found at the edge of the bridge where it's been broken, past all the Golems. Transports you past the broken bridge sections directly to the Divine Tower of Limgrave.

name: Divine Fortification
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab found atop a collapsed stone structure overgrown with yellow moss.

name: Divine Tower of Caelid
description: Divine Tower located in central Dragonbarrow. Accessed via careful platforming.

name: Divine Tower of Caelid: Basement
description: Site of Grace found at the bottom of the tower, after a long platforming section to descend the central area of the tower.

name: Divine Tower of Caelid: Center
description: Site of Grace found on a balcony in the middle floor of the Divine Tower. This is where you enter the tower initially by carefully platforming along the outer edge of the tower.

name: Divine Tower of East Altus
description: Divine Tower of East Altus.

name: Divine Tower of East Altus: Gate
Divine Tower of Limgrave
description: Site of grace near the Tower of Limgrave

name: Divine Tower of Limgrave
description: Accessible only from Stormveil Castle, this location allows the player to activate the power of Godrick's Great Rune.

name: Divine Tower of Liurnia
description: A tower standing on a lone island. Seems like an event of historical value took place here...

name: Divine Tower of Liurnia
description: Site of Grace found on an upper floor of the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

name: Divine Tower of West Altus
description: The entrance to the Divine Tower of West Altus is found at the end of the Sealed Tunnel after going past many illusory walls.

name: Divine Tower of West Altus Gate
description: The Site of Grace can be found before the great entrance door to the Divine Tower.

name: Dominula, Windmill Village
description: Inhabitated by the Godskin Apostle.

name: Dozing Cross-Legged
description: Gesture. Found on a corpse on the largest roof in the area. Accessible from the top floor of the Rampart Tower with careful platforming.

name: Draconic Tree Sentinel
description: Required to enter Leyndell, Royal Capital. Found right outside the capital's entrance.

name: Draconic Tree Sentinel
description: The Draconic Tree Sentinel may not be presented as a boss this time, but it must be defeated in order to be able to go through the gate he's guarding.

name: Dragon Communion Seal
description: Right under the beginning of the game. If you head down, and then back at the part where you can go down or up you'll find a spirit banished knight if you kill him he drops this Weapon.

name: Dragon Cult Prayerbook
description: Dropped by a knight patrolling immediately south of the Liurnia Artist Shack

name: Dragon Greatclaw
description: Colossal Weapon that drops from the Draconic Tree Sentinel

name: Dragon Heart
description: Dropped by Flying Dragon Agheel. Can be used to acquire draconic Incantations at Church of Dragon Communion and Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

name: Dragon Heart
description: Consumable. Dropped by the Magma Wyrm in Volcano Manor.

name: Dragon Heart (Borealis the Freezing Fog)
description: Dropped by Borealis, The Freezing Fog

name: Dragon Heart - Fort Faroth
description: Key Item. 5x dropped by Elder Dragon Greyoll upon defeat.

name: Dragon Heart B
description: Dropped by Magma Wyrm Makar. Can be used to acquire draconic Incantations at Church of Dragon Communion and Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

name: Dragon Heart C
description: Dropped by Decaying Ekzykes

name: Dragon Heart D
description: Dropped by Flying Dragon Greyll

name: Dragon Heart E
description: Drops from Glintstone Dragon Smarag

name: Dragon Heart F
description: Dropped from Magma Wyrm at Gael Tunnel

name: Dragon Heart x3
description: Dropped by Glintstone Dragon Adula. Can be used to acquire draconic Incantations at Church of Dragon Communion and Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

name: Dragon Temple
description: Found after passing through the platform that is below the Ancient Dragon that can be seen from a distance.

name: Dragon Temple Altar
description: This Site of Grace becomes available after defeating the Godskin Duo.

name: Dragon Temple Lift
description: Site of Grace found by ascending the lift. The entrance to the lift is locked behind an Imp Statue seal that requires 2x Stonesword Keysto unlock.

name: Dragon Temple Rooftop
description: Site of Grace found atop the large structure in the north section of the region.

name: Dragon Towershield
description:
Can be found at Crumbling Farum Azula, to the stationary dragon's right over a ledge, near the Pillar drop down a series of ledges to a lower building, it's in a chest to the left up a ladder, there is a knight that drops down as you get close to the ladder
(The "stationary dragon" referring to the one that strikes red lightning at you while you approach it, in the area with a lot of birds past the Dragon Temple Rooftop Grace.)

name: Dragon-Burnt Ruins
description: Located in the lake of Limgrave.

name: Dragonbarrow Cave
description: Optional Dungeon found in eastern Dragonbarrow. The entrance is found by following the road along the cliffs north of the Minor Erdtree.

name: Dragonbarrow Cave
description: Site of Grace by the entrance to Dragonbarrow Cave.

name: Dragonbarrow West
description: Site of Grace found in western Dragonbarrow.

name: Dragonbolt Blessing
description: Found inside a chest at Stormcaller Church

name: Dragonclaw
description: Incantation. Can be obtained by making a Dragon Heart offering at the altar found in the ruins of the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Dragonclaw Shield
description: Greatshield that drops from the Draconic Tree Sentinel

name: Dragoncrest Greatshield Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in a chest on an elevated platform inside the large building in the northeast, guarded by several Pests. This platform can be reached by heading through the eastern exit from the Drainage Channel site of grace and then navigating across the branches and concrete beams to reach the roof of the building. While there are many branches and beams to traverse, the path is fairly linear. Once on the roof, drop through one of the holes onto the wooden beams below and then carefully make your way onto the platform after killing the Pests from range.

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman
description: Talisman found on one of the edges of Bestial Sanctum

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +1
description: Can be found in a locked imp's room in Sainted Hero's Grave.

name: Dragoncrest Shield Talisman +2
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found on a corpse on a chunk of floating debris in the north of the region.

name: Dragonfire
description: Incantation. Can be obtained by making a Dragon Heart offering at the altar found in the ruins of the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Dragonlord Placidusax
description: Can be found by taking the elevator down from "Beside the Great Bridge" Grace site, and exiting before the fight against Maliketh, the Black Blade, Walk down the stairs & outside near the ledge, jump down on the platforms below until you reach a floating platform with Skeletons in their frames. One of the empty graves will give a "Lie Down" prompt, do it and you will be teleported into the boss arena.

name: Dragonmaw
description: Incantation. Can be obtained by making a Dragon Heart offering at the altar found in the ruins of the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Dragonwound Grease
description: Found on a body at the stairs.

name: Dragonwound Grease (A)
description: Looted off a corpse behind the Glintstone Dragon Smarag.

name: Dragonwound Grease (Abandoned Cave)
description: Consumable item found within Abandoned Cave

name: Dragonwound Grease (B)
description: At the right edge of the curved bridge in Crumbling Farum Azula.

name: Dragonwound Grease (D)
description: Rounding the temple and going up the stairs, it can be found near the cliff.

name: Dragonwound Grease C
description: At the end of the corridor, in front of a giant door, NW of Avenue Balcony site of grace.

name: Drainage Channel
description: Site of Grace found in the drainage channels of Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree. This area is accessed by dropping down a ladder found inside an alcove along the inner walls. This requires you to traverse the first lake of rot found after the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace.

name: Drawing-Room Key
description: Key Item. Given by Tanith after pledging your allegiance to the Volcano Manor.

name: Drawstring Fire Grease
description: Found on a body on the corner of the rocks within The Shaded Castle

name: Drawstring Fire Grease (B)
description: Turn back from the Forbidden Lands site of grace, head to the body to obtain x2 Drawstring Fire Grease

name: Drawstring Holy Grease
description: Found on a body near a giant rock.

name: Drawstring Lightning Grease
description: Consumable Item. Two can be found on a corpse by the side of the road guarded by a Zombie Dog.

name: Duelist's Furled Finger
description: Creates competitive multiplayer summon sign.

name: Dung Eater (Royal Capital Moat)
description: NPC Invader. Found after releasing Dung Eater's corporeal body from his cell in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds and then reading his message at the Roundtable Hold.

name: Dung Eater (Subterranean Shunning-Grounds)
description: Quest NPC. Found in a cell in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds beneath the Royal Capital. To reach his cell, head northeast from the Underground Roadside site of grace and enter a grate in the floor to access the aqueducts. Continue north past the Rats and Giant Poison Flower and climb up the ladder. You can find the cell door in the next room past the ladder. It is unlocked using the Sewer-Gaol Key given by the same NPC but in his non-corporeal form at the Roundtable Hold.

name: Earthbore Cave
description: A small dark cave on the side of the cliffside between Limgrave and Weeping Peninsula.

name: Earthbore Cave
description: Site of Grace found inside the Earthbore Cave, near the entrance.

name: East Capital Rampart
description: Site of Grace at East Capital.

name: East Raya Lucaria Gate
description: Site of grace at the eastern gate of Raya Lucaria.

name: East Windmill Pasture
description: The East Windmill Pasture is found in the Altus Plateau, in the North-most limits of the area

name: Eastern Liurnia Lake Shore
description: Site of Grace found on the eastern side of Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Eastern Tableland
description: Site of Grace found in the middle of a rocky section of the road.

name: Eclipse Crest Greatshield
description: Drops from Mausoleum Knights wielding it in Liurnia of the Lakes (chance to drop, not guaranteed)

name: Eclipse Crest Heater Shield
description: Ledge of the pillar near Tombsward Site of Grace. Can be reached from the ledge near Minor Erdtree

name: Eclipse Shotel
description: Curved Sword. Found at the altar of the Church in the southeast section of the castle.

name: Edgar (First Location)
description: Edgar can be found sitting on a bench up on the ramparts of Castle Morne.

name: Edgar the Revenger
description: Hostile NPC invader. Invades when you interact with the Site of Grace at the Revenger's Shack.

name: Elden Throne
description: Site of grace that appearts on the battlefield where you face Morgott, the Omen King

name: Elder Dragon Greyoll
description: Massive boss surrounded by dragons. Drops 10,845 Runes and x5 Dragon Heart

name: Elemer of the Briar
description: Found inside The Shaded Castle. Drops Marais Executioner's Sword and Briar Greatshield

name: Eleonora's Poleblade
description: Dropped by Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger

name: Eleonora, Violet Bloody Finger
description: After talking to Bloody Finger Hunter Yura at the Second Church of Marika

name: Elphael Inner Wall
description: Site of Grace found within Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree.

name: Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Legacy Dungeon. Accessed through Miquella's Haligtree.

name: Enemy Caravan (Aluts Plateau)
description: Enemy Caravan traveling the Road of Iniquity. Loot Great Stars from its chest.

name: Enemy Caravan (Dragonbarrow)
description: Enemy Caravan. The Greatword can be looted from its chest.

name: Enemy Caravan (Limgrave)
description: Enemy Caravan traveling the road South in Limgrave. Chest within contains Greataxe.

name: Enemy Caravan (West Liurnia of the Lakes)
description: An enemy caravan travels this road. Loot the Carian Night's Sword from the chest they protect.

name: Enemy Caravan 1 (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Enemy Caravan. Loot the chest to obtain St. Trina's Torch

name: Enemy Caravan 2 (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Enemy Caravan. Loot the chest to obtain Flowing Curved Sword

name: Envoy Crown
description: Helmet. Looted from the very edge of the branches.

name: Erdsteel Dagger
description: Dagger. Rewarded by Kenneth Haight for clearing out Fort Haight.

name: Erdsteel Dagger
