description: Drop down a pit with a Broken Statue and it will be on a corpse.

name: Erdtree Avatar
description: Miniboss found guarding the Erdtree. Drops the Opaline Bubbletear and Crimsonburst Crystal Tear upon defeat.

name: Erdtree Avatar (Caelid)
description: Field Boss. Drops Greenburst Crystal Tear and Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear upon defeat.

name: Erdtree Avatar (Leyndell)
description: Mini boss that patrols the main road in Leyndell, Royal Capital. Drops Lord's Rune

name: Erdtree Avatar (Liurnia Northeast)
description: Field Boss. Drops Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear, Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear and Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear

name: Erdtree Avatar (Liurnia Southwest)
description: Field Boss. Drops Cerulean Crystal Tear and Ruptured Crystal Tear

name: Erdtree Avatar (Mountaintops East)
description: Field Boss found roaming the fields near the Minor Erdtree. Drops Cerulean Crystal Tear and Crimson Bubbletear upon defeat.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Cliffbottom Catacombs)
description: Optional Boss found at the end of the Cliffbottom Catacombs. Drops the Kaiden Sellsword Ashes upon defeat.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Impaler's Catacombs)
description: Found within Impaler's Catacombs. Drops Demi-Human Ashes upon defeat.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Minor Erdtree Catacombs)
description: Duo boss fight against a Watchdog wielding a Sword and another wielding a Scepter. Drops the Mad Pumpkin Head Ashes upon defeat.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Stormfoot Catacombs)
description: Optional Boss found at the end of Stormfoot Catacombs. Drops Noble Sorcerer Ashes upon defeat.

name: Erdtree Burial Watchdog (Wyndham Catacombs)
description: Optional boss found at the end of the Wyndham Catacombs. Drops Glovewort Picker's Bell Bearing (1) upon defeat.

name: Erdtree Greatbow
description: Dropped from the Chariot inside Fringefolk Hero's Grave

name: Erdtree Greatshield
description: Dropped by the Tree Sentinel duo

name: Erdtree Sanctuary
description: Site of grace inside the Erdtree Sanctuary.

name: Erdtree Seal
description: Sacred Seal. Found on a corpse in a building close to the Omenkiller in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: Erdtree's Favor
description: Head down until you see the path narrow on both sides and drop just at the edge where it begins to find a secret area. Defeat the imps and proceed past the fire trap to find the item resting at an altar. Two Grafted Scions wait hanging above, so be sure to avoid them when they land and grab it really quickly

name: Erdtree's Favor +1
description: Found inside a chest, in the room where you fight Mohg, The Omen

name: Erdtree's Favor +2
description: Upgraded Talisman. This Talisman may only be accessed near endgame/post-game. Found on top of a branch jutting out of the ground in a large courtyard, guarded by two large rotten beasts.

name: Errant Sorcerer Set (No Helm)
description:
The Errant Sorcerer Robe, Errant Sorcerer Manchettes, and Errant Sorcerer Boots can be looted together from a corpse in a house on the northeast corner of the village.
Hierodas Glintstone Crown can be looted from a corpse behind a house on the southern end of the village.

name: Eternal Darkness
description: Sorcery. Found within Swamp Lookout Tower in Caelid.

name: Exalted Flesh
description: Found hanging over an edge, above the staircase. Near a tree and some graves.

name: Eye Surcoat
description: Chest Armor. Found on the ground after defeating Rykard, Lord of Blasphemy.

name: Faith-knot Crystal Tear
description: North of the Demi-Human Forest Ruins. Directly east of the Church of Pilgrimage, just down the cliff. It's in a bowl under a tree and surrounded by Poison Flowers.

name: Faithful's Canvas Talisman
description: Located on a corpse guarded by two Prawn Miner inside Sellia Crystal Tunnel

name: Falchion
description: Dropped by Demi-Human enemies under the bridge.

name: Fallen Ruins of the Lakes
description: Site of Grace found in the marshes east of Rose Church.

name: Fallingstar Beast
description: Optional Boss found at the end of the Sellia Crystal Tunnel. Drops the Somberstone Miner's Bell Bearing (1) as well as 1 x Somber Smithing Stone (6), 5 x Smithing Stone (7) and 4x Gravity Stone Chunk upon defeat.

name: Fallingstar Beast
description: Optional boss. Found directly south of the large bridge. The map will display a large crater there, which is where it will spawn.

name: Fallingstar Beast Jaw
description: Colossal Weapon Dropped by Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast

name: Family Heads
description: Flail. Dropped from boss of Sage's Cave, Necromancer Garris.

name: Fan Daggers
description: Found at the end of the alley on your left, beware of the enemy hiding behind the wall.

name: Fan Daggers - 5x Castle Sol
description: Offensive Consumable Item. 5x can be found on a corpse at the eastern edge of the roof of the northwest building with a ladder.

name: Farum Greatbridge
description: Site of grace of the Farum Greatbridge

name: Fell Twins
description: Bulky ogre-like beasts wielding flaming armament.

name: Festering Bloody Finger
description: Multiplayer Item. Given by White-Faced Varre after exhausting his dialogue.

name: Festering Fingerprint Vyke
description: Invader using a War Spear of their name.

name: Fevor's Cookbook (1)
description: Found on a corpse on the graveyard south from Summonwater. Unlocks Sleep Pot Recipe.

name: Finger Maiden Set
description: Light Armor Set by the Site of Grace of Church of Inhibition. Includes Finger Maiden Fillet, Finger Maiden Robe and Finger Maiden Shoes

name: Finger Maiden Therolina Puppet
description: Spirit Ashes. Can be bought from a body in Seluvis's Rise for Starlight Shards after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Finger Severer
description: Multiplayer Item. Found on a corpse by the wall just past the Site of Grace in the Stranded Graveyard. Found along with the Tarnished's Furled Finger.

name: Fingerprint Set
description: Full Armor Set drops from Lord Contender's Evergaol Boss Fight: Roundtable Knight Vyke

name: Fingerprint Stone Shield
description:
Subterranean shunning grounds. Past the Altar you Fight mini boss vsersion of Mohg then down some platformer style gameplay.
This shield was one of the most difficult things to get to in this game. Starting in the Royal capital you will need to find the water well to climb into and find the subterranean shunning grounds. There will be a grace known as "Underground Roadside".
From there you will want to transverse the sewer pipe to get to the other side of the area. Once done there will be an elevator to take you down to a grace which is right before the mini boss version of Mohg. After defeating him you can roll/attack the altar behind the chest and it will move down out of the way revealing a path. Following this path will lead you to the hardest part which is jumping from coffin to coffin to make your way down the area. NOTE it is slightly above the bottom floor so do not jump off even if you will survive. If you miss that coffin, you will have to start from the beggining of the coffin descend all over to obtain the shield.

name: Fire Arrow - 1x Stormhill Warmaster Shack
description: Consumable Item. One arrow can be looted from a corpse in the road, guarded by two Mercenaries.

name: Fire Giant
description: Main Boss. Found at Flame Peak. Drops Remembrance of the Fire Giant

name: Fire Grease (Abandoned Cave)
description: Consumable item found within Abandoned Cave

name: Fire Grease - X2 CASTLE MORNE
description: Consumable. 2 can be found on a corpse near the the burning pile of corpses in the courtyard.

name: Fire Monk Ashes
description: Take the first elevator in the dungeon down and then reactive it to send it back up but do not ride it. There will be a secret elevator you can now take to go down farther. Fight past the Imps, Erdtree Burial Watchdogs, and frost pillar traps, and the Fire Monk Ashes will be on a corpse at the end of this path.

name: Fire Monks' Prayerbook
description: Incantation Tome. Found on a corpse in an enemy outpost in the area.

name: Fire Scorpion Charm
description: Raises fire attack, but lowers damage negation. Found next to the talking spirit on the top of the walls.

name: Fireproof Dried Liver
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse guarded by the Bloodhound Knight in Volcano Manor's secret passageway.

name: Fireproof Dried Liver
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse in the outskirts of a building in the Volcano Manor dungeon.

name: First Church of Marika
description: Destroyed Church with a Sacred Tear and Somber Miner's Bell Bearing (3). Offers a respite before a Dragon encounter.

name: First Church of Marika
description: Site of Grace of the First Church of Marika

name: First Mt. Gelmir Campsite
description: Site of Grace

name: Flail
description: It can be found in a charriot, defended by a group of soldiers. near the Gatefront Ruins

name: Flamberge
description: Can be found at the top of the tower, on a corpse. Beware of the Pumpkin Head protecting it.

name: Flame Crest Wooden Shield
description: You can loot the Flame Crest Wooden Shield from a Slender Wayfarer's corpse inside one of the cabins.

name: Flame of the Fell God
description: Incantation. Dropped by Adan, Thief of Fire inside the Malefactor's Evergaol.

name: Flame, Cleanse Me
description: Held by one of the corpses at the Fire Monk camp.

name: Flame, Grant me Strength
description: Found behind a Fort Gael, on a body between two Maneuverable Flamethrowers

name: Flame, Protect Me
description: Incantation. Found in a room at the beginning of the Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave, just in front of the Site of Grace. Requires 2 Stonesword Keys to unlock.

name: Flame-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Physick Flask material. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding this tree.

name: Flamedrake Talisman
description: Talisman. Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azula boss inside Groveside Cave.

name: Flamedrake Talisman +1
description: Found on the ground, against a column.

name: Flamedrake Talisman +2
description: Talisman. Dropped by the Beastman of Farum Azuladuo bosses in Dragonbarrow Cave.

name: Flask of Wondrous Physick
description: Laying on the ground in front of the statue. Bestows various special effects.

name: Flowing Curved Sword
description: Curved Sword. Found within the chest of the Enemy Caravan traveling the Consecrated Snowfield south-western area.

name: Flying Dragon Agheel
description: Fight at higher levels. Rewards a Dragon Heart you can use at the Church of Dragon Communion.

name: Freezing Lake

name: Frenzied Flame Proscription

name: Frenzied Flame Village

name: Frenzied Flame Village Outskirts

name: Frenzy-Flaming Tower

name: Fringefolk Hero's Grave
description: Starter Tutorial Location.

name: Frozen Armament
description: Sorcery. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in an area behind Caria Manor. This area is accessible after completing the manor and defeating Royal Knight Loretta.

name: Frozen Needle
description: Thrusting Sword. Found in a chest inside a small room in an underground area of the ruins. The Royal Revenant needs to be defeated to gain access to this room.

name: Frustrated Spirit
description: Laying down on the floor, next to the remains of a burnt pillage.

name: Full Moon Crossbow
description:
From the Debate Parlor Site of Grace, head out into the courtyard and to the left to reach the rooftops. Continue along the rooftops until the tower past the Glintstone Sorcerer and three Avionette Soldiers. Across from the tower on another rooftop, an item will be visible. Drop down to the rooftop below and jump on top of the spike near the right edge. From the spike, turn left and jump onto the gargoyle (architectural, not an enemy) protruding from a corner of the building. Another jump will bring you to the rooftop with the item, a Smithing Stone [4]. Alternatively, you can reach this item by jumping from the tower onto a roof opposite the Full Moon Crossbow's chest in the tower.
From that roof, a long jump will be required to reach the rooftops with the patrolling Marionette Soldier with spears. Sprinting before the jump is required, as a normal jump will not cover the distance. Note that there is a delay before sprinting starts (likely to determine whether the player is trying to roll or sprint).
Continue along the rooftops to the left, past the four Marionette Soldiers and jump onto a platform connected to a tower. Inside, two Marionette Soldiers will ambush you from either side. Climb up the ladder to find a chest with the Full Moon Crossbow.

name: Full-Grown Fallingstar Beast
description: Optional Field Boss found high up in Mt. Gelmir.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
description: Dropped by Old Knight Istvan after successfully invading his world.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
description: Dropped by Rileigh the Idle after successfully invading his world.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
description: Multiplayer Item. Dropped by Great Horned Tragoth after successfully invading his world.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy
description: Multiplayer Item. Dropped by Anastasia, Tarnished-Eater.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy - Revenger's Shack

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy - x1 - Leyndell Royal Capital

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy C

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy D

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy F

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy G
description: Found at the end of the corridor past the elevator, on a body to your left side.

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy H

name: Furlcalling Finger Remedy I

description:
Furlcalling Finger Remedy can be dropped in

Highroad Cave

name: Gaol Cave

name: Ghost Glovewort [4]

name: Glintstone Dragon Adula (Three Sisters)

description: A fearsome magic dragon with crystalized magic formation for scales. Guards the Academy Glintstone Key.

name: Glintstone Firefly
description: Looted off a corpse, north section of the courtyard.

name: Glintstone Firefly x3

name: Godrick the Grafted

name: Godskin Apostle & Godskin Noble

name: Godskin Apostle (Caelid)

name: Godskin Duo
description: The Godskin Apostle and Godskin Noble are found again inside the main hall of the Dragon Temple, just that this time they will fight simultaneusly against you. Drops Smithing-Stone Miner's Bell Bearing (4) and Ashes of War: Black Flame Tornado upon defeat.

name: Godskin Noble (Divine Tower of Liurnia)

name: Godskin Noble Set

name: Godskin Noble(Volcano Manor)
description: Can be found at Volcano Manor.From the Volcano Manor Site of Grace, go into the hallway next to it and open the first door on the right. You must first agree to join the Main Woman sitting next to the Knight in order to open this door. Once inside you will find a wall and in front of it a corpse, then jump on it to make it disappear and a new passage appears to enter the Godskin Noble area.

name: Godskin Peeler

name: Godskin Stitcher

name: Godskin Swaddling Cloth

name: Godslayer's Seal

name: Gold Firefly x2

name: Gold-Pickled Fowl Foot
description: Near the waterfall, beware of the lurking skeletons

name: Gold-Pickled Fowl Foot B

name: Golden Halberd

name: Golden Rune (1) D

name: Golden Rune (1) E

name: Golden Rune (1) G

name: Golden Rune (1) H

name: Golden Rune (1) J

name: Golden Rune (1) K

name: Golden Rune (1) M

name: Golden Rune (3) B

name: Golden Rune (3) D

name: Golden Rune (3) E

name: Golden Rune (3a)

name: Golden Rune (4) A

name: Golden Rune (6) B

name: Golden Rune (6) C

name: Golden Rune (6) D

name: Golden Rune (6)a

name: Golden Rune (6)a

name: Golden Rune (7)

name: Golden Rune (7) - x1 - Cave of Forlorn
description: Inside Cave of the Forlorn. Just jump down from the site of grace.

name: Golden Rune (7) B
description: Found inside Auriza Hero's Grave, at the edge of the path where the lone chariot passes.

name: Golden Rune (8)
description: Found on between the bushes to the right of a big staircase.

name: Golden Rune (8)
description: Rune Consumable. Found among a cluster of sarcophagi high up on a cliff. You can reach this area by using the Spiritspring at Lenne's Rise.

name: Golden Rune (8)  B
description: Found at the end of the alleway.

name: Golden Rune (8) C
description: Found at the end of an alleway, there is a Broken Statue at the end. There is also a Golden Rune (11)

name: Golden Rune (8) D
description: Found on the left side of the sewers, where the rats are.

name: Golden Rune (8) E
description: The first body on the staircase in the main road.

name: Golden Rune (9)
description: Can be found near the wheel of a chariot, at the main road.

name: Golden Rune (9) A
description: By a dead body taking a leap down to the right which is the only way you can take .

name: Golden Rune (9) B
description: Found at the patio, on a body.

name: Golden Rune (9) C
description: Found behind a column at the upper ground area.

name: Golden Rune (9) D
description: Found on a big chapel with statues, where there's also a knight that performs the same moveset as Crucible Knight Ordivis, on a body , near the left exit.

name: Golden Rune (9) D
description: Found on a body that two dogs are devouring.

name: Golden Rune [10] - 1x Guardian's Garrison
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse on the ledge past some barrels near the entrance to Guardian's Garrison.

name: Golden Rune [10] - 3x Castle Sol
description: Rune Consumable. One found on a grave to the south as soon as you enter the main gate. Beware as there is a sleeping Lion Guardian right next to it. A second one is found on a corpse sitting by the northwest corner of the wall, in the upper level. Access via ladder in a building nearby. One more is found on a corpse in the northeast section, on top of a building north of the Church.

name: Golden Rune [10] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse leaning over the balcony of the room with many braziers.

name: Golden Rune [10] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse in a small alcove along the inner wall. Note that this is found after traversing the lake of rot, after passing the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace.

name: Golden Rune [12] - Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Consumable Item. Looted from a corpse on the third floor, by the lever that opens the boss door.

name: Golden Rune [12] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse next to an Imp Statue seal in the lower levels.

name: Golden Rune [13] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found in a small room along with Haligtree Knights sitting on chairs. This room is found along the walkway after the Prayer Room.

name: Golden Rune [1] (A) - x1 Dragon-Burnt Ruins
description: Over a big stone, where some bats are nesting. Defeat them to loot the body.

name: Golden Rune [1] B
description: Found on the ground East of Church of Vows.

name: Golden Rune [2] (A)
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse along the road.

name: Golden Rune [2] (C)
description: Looted off a corpse at the Church of the Cuckoo in Raya Lucaria Academy

name: Golden Rune [2] (D)
description: Can be looted off of defeated Rats within the Tombsward Cave.

name: Golden Rune [2] (E)-x1 Dragon-Burnt Ruins
description:
Consumable. Pillage the remains in the middle of

Dragon-Burnt Ruins

name: Golden Rune [2] - X1 CASTLE MORNE
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse partially hanging on a ledge at the top level of the castle. Beware the harpies nearby.

name: Golden Rune [5] - x1 - Highway Lookout Tower
description: Held by the corpse in the middle of the area. Beware of the spawning Spirit Wandering Nobles.

name: Golden Rune [5] - x1 - Perfumer's Ruins
description: Located on one of the south facing walls, where the main table with the candles is.

name: Golden Rune [6] (A)
description: Consumable item. Dropped by an elite singing Bat enemy found along the cliffs south of the Minor Erdtree. You can hear the bat singing as you approach the cliffs. He is guarded by other Giant Bats.

name: Golden Rune [9] - 1x Caelid Treasure
description: Consumable Item. Found as a treasure in Caelid

name: Golden Rune [9] - 1x Castle Sol
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse in the middle level of the eastern section of the castle. Accessible via ladder outside the church's main entrance.

name: Golden Scarab
description: Dropped by Cleanrot Knight (Sickle) & Cleanrot Knight (Spear) boss found in Abandoned Cave. It can be accessed by going east from Smoldering Wall site of grace and walking across canyon by using tree branches.

name: Golden Seed
description: Found right next to the road in western Altus Plateau.

name: Golden Seed (A)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. One can be found on the ground next to a glowing sapling.

name: Golden Seed (B)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Two can be found under the Phantom Tree in the northwestern outer wall section.

name: Golden Seed (C)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. 2 can be found underneath the Phantom Tree at the Capital Outskirts.

name: Golden Seed (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found by a pillar within the snowstorm, near a cookbook north from Consecrated Snowfield site of grace.

name: Golden Seed (D)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found next to a glowing leafless tree in the northeastern section of the castle, behind the courtyard. A Troll guards the large steps further to the north.

name: Golden Seed (E)
description: Flask Upgrade. Found right in front of the entrance to Fort Haight.

name: Golden Seed (F)
description: Golden Seeds allow the user to upgrade the number of Crimson and Cerulean Flask Uses, but not the amount of Wondrous Physik flasks available.

name: Golden Seed (G)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. One can be found on the ground next to a glowing sapling.

name: Golden Seed (H)
description: Flask Upgrade material. Found under a Phantom Tree in the manor's upper level.

name: Golden Seed (I)
description: Found just south of where Poison Pods are located. Found besides a glowing tree.

name: Golden Seed (J)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree as you exit the narrow channel north of Seethewater River.

name: Golden Seed (J)
description: 1 can be found on the ground, next to the glowing sapling. West of the academy's courtyard.

name: Golden Seed (K)
description: Flask upgrade material. Found along the main road, while heading to the Bestial Sanctum

name: Golden Seed (L)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree at the top of the large stairs in the northern section of town.

name: Golden Seed (M)
description: Found under a golden tree by the side of the road.

name: Golden Seed (N)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree in the lower valley northeast of the Minor Erdtree.

name: Golden Seed (O)
description: Found before a massive frozen giant.

name: Golden Seed (P)
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Found under a Phantom Tree by some pillars south of the fountain plaza. This area is on the upper level after ascending the Dragon Temple Lift.

name: Golden Seed (Stormveil Castle)
description: Golden Seed. Dropped by Abyssal Monstrosity-like mini bosses in a hidden path

name: Golden Seed - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Flask Upgrade Material. Dropped by the Ulcerated Tree Spirit lurking beneath the second lake of rot, past a second set of branches within the inner walls.

name: Golden Seed - Forbidden Lands
description: From the Forbidden Lands Site of grace, move towards the Grand Lift of Rold. You'll eventually come across the Golden Seed.

name: Golden Seed - Liftside Chamber
description: Obtained by defeating a Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit in the underground area of Stormveil Castle. You have to unlock the door by the Liftside Chamber site of grace in ordeer to get there.

name: Golden Seed - Liurnia of the Lakes
description: Can be found north of the Main Academy Gate site of grace, on the bridge.

name: Golden Seed - Lux Ruins
description: Found just north of Lux Ruins

name: Golden Seed - Minor Erdtree Altus Plateau
description: One can be found near the Minor Erdtree (northwest of it) in Altus Plateau.

name: Golden Seed - War-Dead Catacombs
description: Obtained by defeating the Putrid Tree Spirit inside the War-Dead Catacombs

name: Golden Seed - Weeping Peninsula
description: Golden Seed that can be found between two sites of grace, Castle Morne Lift and Castle Morne Rampart. Follow the main road and it will be hard to miss.

name: Golden Seed - Windmill Village
description: One can be found at a phantom tree South East of Windmill Village site of grace (following the road).

name: Golden Seed - x1 Fringefolk Hero's Grave
description: This item is obtained after Defeating the Ulcerated Tree Sprit located within Fringefolk Hero's Grave.

name: Golden Seed - x2 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description: The first one is found by the by defeating the Lesser Ulcerated Tree Spirit NW of the Avenue Balcony Site of grace. The second one is found on a balcony to the SW of West Capital Rampart site of grace.

name: Golden Tailoring Tools
description: Tools made of gold brought with the red-haired Radagon when he married into the Carian line. Located inside a chest at the right of Church of Vows' main entrance.

name: Golden Vow (Spell)
description: Incantation. Found on a corpse inside the Corpse-Stench Shack.

name: Goldmask
description: Found around the Forest-Spanning Greatbridge.

name: Goldmask (Second Location)
description: NPC found alongside Brother Corhyn

name: Golem Greatbow
description: Dropped by Golem Archer.

name: Golem's Halberd
description: Dropped by one of the Golems at the bridge.

name: Gowry
description: Quest NPC. A once great Sage living in isolation. Found inside his shack near Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

name: Gowry's Shack
description: A lone shack found below the eastern hills near Sellia, Town of Sorcery.

name: Grace Mimic
description: Consumable. Given as a reward by a non-hostile Commoner NPC sitting on the roof of a building. Use the ladder nearby to reach him.

name: Grace Mimic (A)
description: Looted off a corpse at the northwest of the graveyard. The body is next to a gravestone, sitting by the ledge.

name: Grace Mimic (B)
description: Found on a dead body on the way.

name: Grafted Blade Greatsword
description: Greatsword. Dropped by Leonine Misbegotten upon defeat.

name: Grafted Scion
description: Optional Miniboss. Patrols the main hall of his fortress. No special drops.

name: Grafted Scion
description: A Grafted Scion can be found at the destroyed camp across the stone pillar, at the bottom of the cliffs.

name: Grafted Scion (Tutorial)
description: Boss fought within the tutorial stage at Chapel of Anticipation.

name: Grand Lift of Dectus
description: Site of Grace found on the Liurnia side of the Grand Lift of Dectus.

name: Grand Lift of Dectus
description: A massive lift that connects the Altus Plateau to Liurnia. Requires collection of both Dectus Medallion (Left) and Dectus Medallion (Right) to activate.

name: Grand Lift of Rold
description: Elevator connecting Lyndell and Mountaintop of the Giants. Can also be used to access Consecrated Grounds, by those who have obtained the Haligtree Medallion pieces.

name: Grand Lift of Rold (Site of Grace)
description: Site of grace, located at the side of the Grand Lift of Rold

name: Grave Glovewort
description: Grave Gloveworth (1) can be found at the end of the tunnel.

name: Grave Glovewort (1)
description: To the Right before the second fire column, climb the ladder. On the left, you can find it.

name: Grave Glovewort (1)
description: Grave Glovewort (1) is in the in-between level of Stormfoot Catacombs. Once you reach the top, fall from the second arch to reach it. In the vicinity you will notice the Glovewort.

name: Grave Glovewort (1) B
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found inside the Spiritcaller's Cave, in the long cavern before the boss arena.

name: Grave Glovewort (1) F
description: Multiple found inside Murkwater Cave.

name: Grave Glovewort (2)
description: Found inside the Black Knife Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (2)
description: Can be found inside the Cliffbottom Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (2)
description: Can be found inside the Road's End Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (3)
description: Found inside the Black Knife Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (3)
description: Can be found inside the Cliffbottom Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (3) a
description: Inside the Road's End Catacombs. Past the first few Enemies, down the stairs, there are three Grave Glovewort (3).

name: Grave Glovewort (3) B
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found inside the Spiritcaller's Cave, in the long cavern before the boss arena.

name: Grave Glovewort (3) C
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found in a hallway in the caverns under the elevator in the Minor Erdtree Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (4)
description: Found inside the Black Knife Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (4) A
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Multiple are found within the Unsightly Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (4) B
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Multiple are found within the Wyndham Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (4) C
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found in a hallway in the caverns under the elevator in the Minor Erdtree Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (5) A
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Multiple are found within the Unsightly Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (5) B
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Multiple are found within the Wyndham Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (5) C
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. 2 in total. First is found in a room on the floor that the elevator goes down to. Another is found on an upper ledge in a room beneath the elevator shaft with water that inflicts scarlet rot.

name: Grave Glovewort (7) - x1 - Cave of The Forlorn
description: Found inside the Cave of the Forlorn, in the big room where you fight a few Jellyfish.

name: Grave Glovewort (a)
description: Grave Glovewort 1 found after taking a left turn and heading downstairs, turn back at the base of the stairs to grab it. Beware of the rising Skeletons. Inside the Deathtouched Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort (b)
description: Grave Glovewort 1 found inside Deathtouched Catacombs. Just in front of the other one, after heading down the stairs, turn to the right and you will find it on your left side.

name: Grave Glovewort (c)
description: Can be found inside the Deathtouched Catacombs. The Grave Glovewort (1) is located in the big hall with Skeletons both in the lower and upper level.

name: Grave Glovewort (d)
description: Found inside Deathtouched Catacombs. After unlocking the lever at the end of the dungeon, in the newly opened room, you will find the Grave Glovewort (1).

name: Grave Glovewort [3]
description: You can found x2 Grave Glovewort [3] in the Caelid Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort [4]
description: You can found x3 Grave Glovewort [4] in the Caelid Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort [5]
description: You can found x2 Grave Glovewort [5] in the Caelid Catacombs.

name: Grave Glovewort [7] - 1x Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One found by a set of steps opposite the first Lesser Burial Watchdog encountered.

name: Grave Glovewort [8] - 1x Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One found in the large hall locked behind an Imp Statue barrier. This is directly above the flamethrower pillar and there is a hole in the ground where a section of the pillar can rise through.

name: Grave Glovewort [8] - Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Upgrade material. One is found in the first room with a frost trap.

name: Grave Glovewort [9] - 1x Giant-Conquering Hero's Grave
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. One is found in a room behind the first Lesser Burial Watchdog encountered, taking the short steps down.

name: Grave Glovewort [9] - 6x Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Upgrade material. 6 in total. First is found within the Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs, in a room filled with imps. Another one is found in the room before taking the stairs to the second floor of the frost trap. Third is on second floor by the trap. A fourth is guarded by two Cleanrot Knights in a room in the second floor by the trap. A fifth one can be looted on the third floor by the lever to open the boss door. Final one is in a room in the second floor, guarded by a Burial Tree Watchdog.

name: Grave Glovewort [9] - Hidden Path to the Haligtree
description: Guarded by two Land Octopuses and a Vulgar Militiaman.

name: Grave Gloveworth (e)
description: Grave Glovewort 1 found inside Deathtouched Catacombs. After using the lever, head to the new room, it is in the upper level, where the Skeleton Archers await you.

name: Grave Violet
description: Found at the graves.

name: Grave Warden Duelist (Auriza Side Tomb)
description: Field Enemy located inside Auriza Side Tomb.

name: Grave Warden Duelist (Limgrave)
description: Found within Murkwater Catacombs.

name: Gravel Stone
description: Crafting Material. Two obtained by a grave marker overlooking the cliffs. Guarded by a Pumpkin Head.

name: Gravel Stone
description: Not very in too deep into the Yelough Anix Tunnel on the ground when the first Miners are encountered.

name: Gravel Stone - x6 - Leyndell Royal Capital
description:
You can find Gravel Stone at three different parts:
1) Found at the end of a dark alley, near the main road.
2) Found over the "wing" of the dragon once you manage to get over it.
3) Found at the ruined area, past the Fortified Manor.

name: Gravel Stone B
description: Crafting Material, found in the middle of the lake. Before of the lurking Dragons in the area.

name: Gravel Stone D - x5 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: Going down the elevator behind the big hall after the Crumbling Beast Grave Depths Site of Grace, there's an area filled with Wormfaces. At the end, far east at the edge of the last corner, there's x5 Gravel Stone.

name: Gravel Stone E - x3 - Crumbling Farum Azula
description: On the side of the hallway part on a dead body near the corner.

name: Graven-Mass Talisman
description: Talisman found in a chest atop the Albinauric Rise tower.

name: Graven-School Talisman
description: Found up the ladder close to the Debate Hall Site of Grace and then down the hole to another the room with potboys.

name: Gravity Stone Chunk
description: Found inside a chest in a small cabin. The chest is next to where you are teleported to upon using the trap coffer at Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Gravity Stone Fan
description: Offensive Consumable Item. Found on a corpse by the cliffs.

name: Gravity Stone Fan (Caelid)
description: Found inside a chest in a small cabin. The chest is next to where you are teleported to upon using the trap coffer at Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Gravity Stone Peddler's Bell Bearing
description: Key Item. Dropped by the Bell Bearing Hunter that spawns at this location at night time.

name: Gravity Well
description: Dropped by the Monolith Guardian enemy that appears from a gravity portal. The section is near the graveyard and the large rotating lift of Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Great Club
description: Hammer Weapon. Dropped by the Stonedigger Troll boss inside the Old Altus Tunnel upon defeat.

name: Great Dragonfly Head
description: On a corpse underwater at the Dragon-Burnt Ruins.

name: Great Epee
description: Head southeast from the Agheel Lake South site of grace, head to the top of a cliff and you'll see a statue of an object that looks like the half piece of a bowl or a circle. Face the other way, and get down, you will find a group of enemies. The Great Epee is inside a chest. on the right side.

name: Great Grave Glovewort (Crumbling Farum Azula)
description: Upgrade Material. From the dragon temple grace turn around and drop to a floating staircase. take the second door and follow a series of floating platforms to a ladder. The Great Grave Glovewort is located in a hidden tomb at the top of the ladder

name: Great Grave Glovewort - Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs
description: Upgrade Material. Dropped by the boss of Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs, Putrid Grave Warden Duelist.

name: Great Grave Glovewort - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Spirit Ash Upgrade Material. Found in the center of the second lake of rot, past a second set of branches inside the inner walls. Beware the Ulcerated Tree Spirit lurking beneath.

name: Great Horned Tragoth
description: Assassination target for the Volcano Manor. You can invade their world using a summoning sign after accepting the assassination request.

name: Great Omenkiller Cleaver
description: Dropped by the Omenkiller at Volcano Manor

name: Great Omenkiller Cleaver
description: Greataxe. Dropped by the boss duo of Perfumer's Grotto: Omenkiller and Miranda the Blighted Bloom.

name: Great Rune of the Unborn
description: Great Rune of Rennala, Queen of the Moon. Acquired as a reward for defeating the supreme sorceress.

name: Great Stars
description: On a guarded wagon in Altus Plateau, traveling on the road SouthWest of the Road of Iniquity Side Path site of grace.

name: Great Turtle Shell
description: Small Shield. Found on a corpse atop the eastern-most tower of the Castle Morne Ramparts. This area can be reached by using Torrent to jump from the Spiritspring located just east of the Site of Grace nearby.

name: Great Wyrm Theodorix
description: It is found outside of the Cave of the Forlorn at night.

name: Great-Jar's Arsenal
description: Reward for completing the 3 duelist NPC invasions in Dragonbarrow (Caelid North) for The Great-Jar. You will only be able to access this area by coming up from Siofra Deep River Well in the underground.

name: Greataxe
description: Found inside the treasure chest within the carriage being pulled by two large Trolls and defended by militia and aristocracy.

name: Greatblade Phalanx
description: Sorcery. Dropped by Bols, Carian Knight inside the Cuckoo's Evergaol.

name: Greatbow
description: Found in a chest at the top of the Highway Lookout Tower.

name: Greatshield Talisman
description: Found in a chest on a Wagon East of Grace "Erdtree-Gazing Hill" behind Ancient Dragon Lansseax.

name: Greatsword
description: Colossal Sword. Looted from the chest in the enemy caravan traveling the Dragonbarrow road.

name: Green Turtle Talisman
description: Talisman. Found in an underground area filled with Turtles. The entrance is found slightly south-east of Summonwater Village and requires 1 Stonesword Key to unlock.

name: Greenburst Crystal Tear
description: Physick Flask material. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar guarding this tree.

name: Greenspill Crystal Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Found on an altar next to the Minor Erdtree in Mistwood.

name: Groveside Cave
description: Site of Grace found inside the Groveside Cave, right before the boss fight.

name: Groveside Cave
description: Small cave north from Church of Elleh.

name: Guardian Golem
description: Found within the Highroad Cave. Drops Blue Dancer Charm

name: Guardians' Garrison
description: A garrison of Fire Priests guard the path to the Giant Forge.

name: Guest Hall
description: Site of Grace.

name: Guilty Hood
description: Held by a corpse on the right side of the sewer-like tunnel.

name: Gurranq, Beast Clergyman
description: A non-hostile NPC found within the Bestial Sanctum. Awards various items for handing in Deathroot.

name: Haligdrake Talisman
description: Talisman. Drop down from the cliff near the Seaside Ruins site of grace. Explore the lower area and between fallen columns, there is a small entrance. Enter and take the path until you fing a hanging body.There you will find the Haligdrake Talisman - this is the unreachable item seen in the Cave of Knowledge starting tutorial

name: Haligdrake Talisman +1
description: Upgraded Talisman. Found on a corpse next to a Lesser Spirit-Caller Snail inside the Leyndell Catacombs. From the Lyndell Catacombs site of grace, head up the elevator in the southeast to find a room with 3 spirit crossbowmen. Look next to the stairs for an illusory wall. Hit it to dispel the illusion, and then hit the wall on the left to dispel another illusion. The corpse and snail are found in here.

name: Haligtree Knight Helm
description: Helmet. Found on a corpse in an upper level room next to the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace. There is a ladder adjacent to the grace which leads to the room.

name: Haligtree Roots
description: Found underground after taking the lift from the large building in the northeast.

name: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left)
description: Key Item. Found in the castle's northeast tower after defeating Commander Niall.

name: Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right)
description: Key Item. Hit Albus, who is disguised as a pot past the Perfumer guarding the path up from the Village of the Albinaurics Site of Grace. This medallion opens the path to a secret location past Lyndell.

name: Haligtree Soldier Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes. Found under a large decorative chalice in the northern edge of the main city proper.

name: Hammer
description: Found inside the Fortified manor, beside the Sanctified Whetblade

name: Hammer Talisman
description: Enhances stamina-reducing attacks against blockers.

name: Hand Ballista
description: At the top of the Forest Lookout Tower, west of the Bridge of Sacrifice.

name: Hawk Crest Wooden Shield
description: Medium Shield. Found on a corpse inside the Armory. Requires a Stonesword Key to dispel the fog gate barring entry.

name: Heart of Aeonia
description: Site of grace in the heart of the Aeonia Swamp

name: Hefty Beast Bone x4
description: Found on a body on the walkway up in the castle area, to the right when exiting the first room after the ladder up.

name: Heretical Rise
description: Puzzle tower that hides the Founding Rain of Stars spell. Unlock the entrance by finding the invisible bridge from the other side of the ravine, and carefully follow the misty path to find the way to enter.

name: Hermit Merchant
description: Merchant within the Hermit Merchant's Shack. Replaced by Bell Bearing Hunter at night.

name: Hermit Merchant's Shack
description: Merchant dwells here. Sells Sentry's Torch and Prophet Set among other items.

name: Hermit Village
description: A secluded village found southeast of the volcano.

name: Hermit's Shack
description: A small shack found south of the volcano.

name: Hero's Rune (1)
description: Found inside Fortified Manor, at the second room.

name: Hero's Rune (1) A
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse inside the Spiritcaller's Cave.

name: Hero's Rune (2)
description: On a body against a wall, beware of the soldier and the lion guarding it.

name: Hero's Rune (2)
description: Found on a body by the edge of the large pillar hanging off the edge.

name: Hero's Rune (2) B
description: On the corner next to the stair there's a corpse a little bit hidden by a bunch of debris.

name: Hero's Rune (5)
description: Found inside the big room with the statues and the knight that can perform the same moves as Crucible Knight Ordovis, on a body.

name: Hero's Rune (5) B
description: Rune Consumable. One found on a corpse by an outer ledge behind a wall. You can get to the ledge by carefully walking on the broken section while hugging the wall.

name: Hero's Rune [5] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse behind a large decorative chalice at the end of the hallway after the Elphael Inner Wall site of grace.

name: Hero's Rune [5] - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Rune Consumable. Found on a corpse under a large tree in the eastern graveyard.

name: Hidden Path to the Haligtree
description: Catacombs leading from the Grand Lift of Rold to Consecrated Grounds. Can only be accessed by those who have found both pieces of the Haligtree Secret Medallion

name: Hierodas Glintstone Crown
description: Can be looted from a corpse behind a house on the southern end of the village.

name: Highland Axe
description: Axe. Found in the same hall as the Grafted Scion miniboss, under a large painting.

name: Highroad Cave
description: A cave that houses a tomb, deep within. It is situated at the northmost part of Limgrave. It has been inhabited by a pack of Wolves, Land Octopuses, and Giant Bats.

name: Highroad Cave Site
description: Site of grace, located inside the entrance of Highroad Cave.

name: Highway Lookout Tower
description: Tower overlooking the highway of Liurnia's eastern landmass.

name: Highway Lookout Tower
description: Tower overlooking the east road of Altus Plateau

name: Holy Grease
description: Over The main road, at the top of the wrecked chariot.

name: Holy Grease - 3x Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Consumable. 3 are found on a corpse on the bridge towards the Prayer Room at the base of Elphael.

name: Holy Grease B
description: Take the giant tree branches located south of West Rampart Capital south of grace. There is one that gets neer a yellowish roof. Jump there and walk along until you find an enemy. Behind it you will find the item

name: Holy Grease C
description: Down the stairs after facing Godfrey, First Elden Lord, you will find it

name: Holy-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar.

name: Holyproof Dried Liver
description: On the sewers, past the Broken Statue, on the room below there are three items to grab, one of those is this one.

name: Hookclaws
description: Claw weapon. Found on a corpse in the corner of a small corridor on the first level of the wine cellar, filled with crates and patrolled by a single Castle Guard.

name: Hoslow's Petal Whip
description: Whip. Dropped by Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood upon defeat.

name: Hoslow's Set
description: Armor Set comprised of Hoslow's Helm, Hoslow's Armor, Hoslow's Gauntlets and Hoslow's Greaves. Dropped by Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood upon defeat.

name: Howl of Shabriri
description: Can be found near to a stone tower named Frenzy-Flaming Tower between the Great Lift of Dectus and the Frenzy-Flaming Tower.

name: Hyetta (First Location)
description: Hyetta, Location 1. Hyetta roams The Lands Between in search of the distant light, drawn to her destiny by a guiding shine she feels in the back of her eyes when eating Shabriri grapes.

name: Hyetta (Fourth location)
description: Hyetta moves here if you have given her shabiri grapes at her previous locations.

name: Hyetta (Second Location)
description: Hyetta, Location 2. She is found at the western side of the Purified Ruins. She asks for another Shabriri Grape but does not give any reward this time.

name: Hyetta (Third Location)
description: Hyetta spawns near the site of grace. She will ask for another Shabriri Grape and will ask what the grapes really are. Telling her will make her puke and then thank you for telling her. After sitting down at the grace nearby she will have more dialog. After once again sitting at the grace she will move to her next location.

name: Ice Crest Shield
description: Small Shield. Found on a corpse up on a ledge by a jagged stone pillar. This area is behind the gardens.

name: Icerind Hatchet
description: Axe found inside a chest in the Temple Quarter. The chest is located inside a ruined building.

name: Icon Shield
description: Found inside a crumbling building. Beware of the enemies inside.

name: Iji's Mirrorhelm
description: Need to confront Blaidd during Ranni's questline. War Counselor Iji will have new dialogue available. After that, his corpse can be found near his usual spot at the Road to the Manor Site of Grace. Upon his anvil, the player will find Iji's Mirrorhelm as well as Iji's Bell Bearing.

name: Imbued Sword Key A
description: Key Item used to activate a Waygate at The Four Belfries. Found in a chest at the very top of the hill, at the fourth belfry tower.

name: Imbued Sword Key B
description: Key Item used to activate a Waygate. It can be looted off a corpse found on the east side of the Raya Lucaria Academy rooftops.

name: Imbued Sword Key C
description: Key Item used to activate a Waygate at The Four Belfries. Found in a chest in the northeast section of town. This location is initially sealed by a barrier that can be dispelled by lighting a brazier atop a tower in the southwest of town.

name: Immunizing Cured Meat
description: Found in the small group of Poison Flowers in the outskirts of the Waypoint Ruins.

name: Immunizing White Cured Meat
description: Temporarily boosts immunity.

name: Immunizing White Cured Meat - Elphael, Brace of the Haligtree
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse at the end of the eastern walkway, on the bottom level.

name: Imp Head (Cat)
description: Helm. Found on a corpse inside the Impaler's Catacombs.

name: Imp Head (Elder)
description: Found as a treasure inside Consecrated Snowfield Catacombs. Inside a room on the second floor, guarded by a Burial Tree Watchdog.

name: Imp Head (Wolf) - x1 - MINOR ERDTREE CATACOMBS
description: Found inside Minor Erdtree Catacombs, held by a corpse laying over a sarcophagus.

name: Impaler's Catacombs
description: Mini-dungeon. The entrance can be found by following the cliffside on the eastern edge of Weeping Peninsula.

name: Impaler's Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found within the Impaler's Catacombs, near the entrance.

name: Impassable Greatbridge
description: A heavily guarded great bridge that leads to the Redmane Castle of Caelid.

name: Incantation Scarab
description: Need to examine the Homecoming Painting at Artist's Shack first. The Incantation Scarab can be found Southwest of the Dragon Burnt Ruins, there will be a gravestone with a ghost sitting in front of it. Interact with the ghost, and it will drop the Incantation Scarab.

name: Inner Aeonia
description: Site of grace within the Swamp of Aeonia

name: Inquisitor Ghiza
description: NPC Invader. Appears at the far end of the dining room when going up to the upper floor of Volcano Manor.

name: Inquisitor's Girandole
description: Spear. Dropped by the Abductor Virgins.

name: Intelligence-knot Crystal Tear
description: From Road to the Manor Site of Grace, head southeast down the slope and turn back towards north. Loot from a small, half-bowl structure guarded by a few Lesser Spider Hand and one Spider Hand.

name: Invigorating Cured Meat - x1 Ordina, Liturgical Town
description: Found on a body on top of the stairs in Ordina, Liturgical Town

name: Invigorating Cured Meat A
description: Consumable. Found on a corpse on the eastern side of the ruins.

name: Invigorating White Cured Meat
description: Found in the middle of the Woodfolk Ruins

name: Invigorating White Cured Meat (2)
description: Found on a body in the middle of the bridge.

name: Invigorating White Cured Meat (C)
description: Found at the bottom of a tree.

name: Irina (First Location)
description: NPC found sitting on a rock at the beginning of the main road in eastern Weeping Peninsula. Hands you Irina's Letter and asks that you deliver it to her father at Castle Morne in the south.

name: Iron Cleaver
description: Dropped by one of the enemies that can be found at behind the big door, on the right side.

name: Iron Cleaver - CASTLE MORNE
description: Dropped by one of the Misbegotten creatures attacking a soldier before reaching the top of Castle Morne.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Fifth Location)
description: NPC. Alexander's fifth location on this questline. Found in Liurnia of the Lakes, just south of Carian Study Hall. Follow the path south from the Artist's Shack Site of Grace. Alexander will call out for help as the player gets closer to his location. He will ask you to make him "slippery". Use an Oil Pot to free him.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (First Location)
description: Alexander, a huge cauldron with arms and legs, is stuck on the ground and needs help.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Fourth Location)
description: NPC. Third location on this questline. He can then be summoned for the boss fight against Starscourge Radahn. If he has not been interacted with prior to this, he will show up at the festival anyway and introduce himself. Before moving to his next location, he can be found scavenging at Starscourge Radahn's Site of Grace.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Second Location)
description: Found inside Gael Tunnel, at the rear entrance. After talking to him, he sets off to Redmane Castle

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Sixth Location)
description: NPC. Alexander's Fifth location on this questline. Found near the Seethewater Terminus Site of Grace at a lava lake south of Fort Laiedd in Mt. Gelmir. Alexander is sitting in the lake behind a Magma Wyrm. It is recommended to consider healing before engaging in conversation.

name: Iron Fist Alexander (Third Location)
description: He can be found here waiting for the festival to start.

name: Iron Whetblade
description: Key Item. Found on a corpse inside the Armory. Requires a Stonesword Key in order to dispel the fog gate barring entry.

name: Isolated Divine Tower
description: Tower to activate Malenia's Great Rune

name: Isolated Merchant
description: General Goods vendor found sitting in his shack. Sells the Lantern and Lost Ashes of War, among other useful items.

name: Isolated Merchant (Raya Lucaria)
description: Merchant. Sells Spirit Ashes, Cookbook, Stonesword Key, Warrior Set, and several useful items.

name: Isolated Merchant Dragonbarrow
description: General Goods vendor found sitting outside his shack in western Dragonbarrow.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Dragonbarrow)
description: Secluded hut found in western Dragonbarrow.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Dragonbarrow)
description: Site of Grace found inside the Isolated Merchant's Shack.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Site of Grace outside the Isolated Merchant's Shack.

name: Isolated Merchant's Shack (Weeping Peninsula)
description: A wooden hut far to the west of the Weeping Peninsula.

name: Ivory Sickle
description: Can be found at the Village of the Albinaurics.It is up a small hill, behind some small houses.

name: Jar Cannon
description: Ballista. Dropped by Demi-Human Queen Margot when defeated.

name: Jarburg
description: Jarburg Village of Living Jars. Abundant herb materials and some Smithing Stone (3) can be found here.

name: Jarburg
description: Site of Grace found in the village of Jarburg.

name: Jarwight Puppet
description: Spirit Ashes. Can be bought from a body in Seluvis's Rise for Starlight Shards after reaching the end of Ranni's questline.

name: Jellyfish Shield
description: On a dead body surrounded by four Jellyfish directly north of the Foot of the Four Belfries Site of Grace.

name: Juno Hoslow, Knight of Blood
description: A hostile NPC that you can invade as part of the final contract for the Volcano Manor questline. Drops Hoslow's Petal Whip along with Hoslow's Set upon defeat.

name: Juvenile Scholar Cap
description: Light Helmet. Found by touching a ghost at the graveyard. This ghost also gives Juvenile Scholar Robe and 1x Larval Tear.

name: Juvenile Scholar Robe
description: Light Chest Armor. Found by touching a ghost at the graveyard. This ghost also gives Juvenile Scholar Cap and 1x Larval Tear.

name: Kaiden Sellsword Ashes
description: Found within Cliffbottom Catacombs. Dropped by Erdtree Burial Watchdog.

name: Karolos Glintstone Crown
description: Drops from the Crystallized Crab that can be found by a corner on the west side of the academy's courtyard.

name: Katar
description: Looted from a treasure chest in Fort Gael. You can find the chest inside a dark room on the elevated platform above the Lion Guardian.

name: Kenneth Haight (First Location)
description: Kenneth Haight is first encountered at this spot. He is seen dramatically calling out for someone to aid him in his plight.

name: Kenneth Haight (Second Location)
description: Kenneth Haight will move to this location after you clear our Fort Haight. He can be found up on the battlements where you fought the Beast Crest Heater Knight.

name: Kindred of Rot
description: Optional Boss. Found by falling through holes to reach the lowest floor of Seethewater Cave.

name: Kindred of Rot Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes. Found within <a href="/Caelid+Catacombs" target="_blank">Caelid Catacombs</>.

name: Kindred of Rot's Exultation
description: Talisman. Dropped by the Kindred of Rot.

name: Kingsrealm Ruins
description: A large set of ruins found in northwest Liurnia.

name: Kukri
description: Looted off a corpse behind the Glintstone Dragon Smarag.

name: Lake-Facing Cliffs
description: Site of grace facing the vast lake

name: Lakeside Crystal Cave
description: Small cave south from the Scenic Isle Site of Grace in Liurnia of the Lakes.

name: Lance
description: On top of the big square structure to the west of Deathtouched Catacombs. Jump off the nearby cliff to reach the top.

name: Lance Talisman
description: Found at the north of Limgrave past the main road close to the edge.

name: Land Octopus Ovary
description: Defeat Land Octopus to obtain.

name: Land Octopus Ovary B
description: Crafting Material, found against the wall, on a small campsite where two Ghost Jellyfish dwell.

name: Land Squirt Ashes
description: Found at a grave with several groups of land squirts nearby on the east shore of Liurnia Lake. To reach it, start at the Gate Town Bridge site of grace, and simply travel north along the shore.

name: Large Club
description: On the lowest cliff south of the Forlorn Hound Evergaol, near a spiritspring

name: Large Glintstone Scrap
description: Accessed from Limgrave Tunnels. Underground. It can be found on a body, inside a little hut guarded by dogs.

name: Large Glintstone Scrap - X2 MORNE TUNNEL
description: Two can be looted off a corpse behind the small shack in Morne Tunnel.

name: Larval Tear (A)
description: Key Item. Can be found at the graveyard in the Village of Albinaurics, near the town well.

name: Larval Tear (B)
description: Key Item. Found by touching a ghost at the graveyard. This ghost also gives Juvenile Scholar Cap and Juvenile Scholar Robe.

name: Larval Tear (Ruins)
description: Dropped from a Miniboss disguises as a noble inside the ruins.

name: Larval Tear - Mt. Gelmir
description: Dropped by Colossal Wormface disguised as charred corpse when defeated. Due East from the Road of Inequities grace, upon entering the ruined camp, and next to the first corpse fire will be the charred remains enemy

name: Laskyar Ruins
description: Ruins found in the marshes south of the lake.

name: Laskyar Ruins Waygate
description: A Waygate that transports the user to the Raya Lucaria Academy's main entrance. Found in a gazebo in the center of the Laskyar Ruins.

name: Latenna
description: NPC found in Slumbering Wolf's Shack. Promising Latenna to take her to the Haligtree, she will join the player and willingly become a Spirit Ash summon, Latenna the Albinauric. She will also hint at the location of the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Left).

name: Latenna the Albinauric
description: In order for Latenna to be friendly and become a spirit, one has to have the Haligtree Secret Medallion (Right), give to the player by Albus at the Village of the Albinaurics.

name: Lazuli Glintstone Crown
description: Looted from a Crystal Crab. Click Here for a detailed guide on how to get it.

name: Leaden Hardtear
description: Dropped by the Ulcerated Tree Spirit

name: Lenne's Rise
description: Tower located at the eastern part of Caelid.

name: Lenne's Rise. (Site of Grace)
description: Site of Grace at the entrance of Lenne's Rise

name: Leonine Misbegotten
description: Optional Greater Enemy Boss. Can be found by heading southeast from the "Beside the Rampart Gaol" Site of Grace, through the wooden bridge and down a ladder onto the shores below. Drops the Grafted Blade Greatsword upon defeat.

name: Letter from Volcano Manor
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining your mission after pledging your services to the Volcano Manor. Found in a room unlocked using the Drawing-Room Key.

name: Letter to Bernahl
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining Bernahl's mission. Given by Bernahl after completing two quests for the Volcano Manor.

name: Letter to Patches
description: Quest Item. A letter outlining Patches' mission. Given by Patches after completing two quests for the Volcano Manor.

name: Leyndell, Royal Capital
description: Leyndell, Royal Capital.

name: Lhutel the Headless
description: Dropped by the Cemetery Shade inside the Tombsward Catacombs

name: Liftside Chamber
description: Site of Grace within Stormveil Castle, towards the west.

name: Lightning Scorpion Charm
description: Found in Wyndham Catacombs in a room sealed by an Imp Statue, requires a Stonesword Key.

name: Lightning Strike
description: Incantation. Dropped by a Teardrop Scarab in the lower section of the crevasse. When approaching from either the eastern or western cliffs, look for stone platforms jutting out of the cliffside to safely descend to the area. Beware as the area is constantly being pummeled by lightning and there are several Giant bats guarding the scarab as well.

name: Lightning-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar.

name: Lightningproof Dried Liver
description: Can be found on a body that is being devoured by enemies

name: Lightningproof Dried Liver A
description: On a dead body at one side of the main way guarded by Gnolls

name: Lightningproof Dried Liver B
description: Found on the third body on the staircase in the main road.

name: Limgrave Tower Bridge
description: Site of Grace found near the eastern bridge.

name: Limgrave Tunnels
description: On the northern area of the Agheel Lake, you can find the rich Limgrave Tunnels

name: Limgrave Tunnels
description: Limgrave Tunnels Site of Grace, located just below the main elevator.

name: Liurnia Highway North
description: Site of Grace found on the side of the road.

name: Liurnia Highway South
description: Site of Grace on the side of the road.

name: Liurnia Lake Shore
description: Site of Grace found on the southern landmass, by the Nomadic Merchant.

name: Liurnia Tower Bridge
description: Site of Grace at the bridge leading to the Divine Tower of Liurnia.

name: Lone Wolf Ashes
description: Given to players by Renna at the Church of Elleh in Limgrave. Return to the Church after getting the ability to summon your Spectral Steed from Melina. You will find Renna sitting by the ruins of the church.

name: Longhaft Axe
description: Rare drop from enemies wielding it at Castle Mourne in Weeping Peninsula. There is an easy to kill one from Beside the Rampant Gaol site of grace [Map Link], cross the bridge and will be on the left sleeping.

name: Longtail Cat Talisman
description: Looted off a corpse that can be found at the bottom section of the large rotating lift. Past the graveyard section of Raya Lucaria Academy, simply ride the lift down and defeat the single Pendulum Statue enemy.

name: Lord Contender's Evergaol
description: Evergaol with Boss Fight: Roundtable Knight Vyke, who drops the Fingerprint Set.

name: Lord's Rune
description: Drops from the Erdtree Avatar that patrols the road.

name: Lordsworn's Greatsword
description: Greatsword. Found inside a Wagon Chest.

name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword
description: Straight Sword. Dropped by Noble soldiers in the Gatefront Ruins.

name: Lordsworn's Straight Sword (B)
description: Dropped by a head-less, undead Soldier at Fourth Church of Marika.

name: Loretta's Greatbow
description: Sorcery. Dropped by Royal Knight Loretta upon defeat.

name: Loretta's Mastery
description: Sorcery. Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree

name: Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree
description: Great Enemy. Found in the large courtyard of a temple in Miquella's Haligtree.

name: Lorreta's War Sickle
description: Halberd. Dropped by Loretta, Knight of the Haligtree.

name: Lost Ashes of War
description: Key Item used to duplicate Ashes of War. Found by the locked gate in the northwestern Capital Outskirts.

name: Lost Ashes of War
description: Found at the bottom of the sewers.

name: Lost Ashes of War
description: Ash of War Upgrade. Found on a corpse slumped over in front of a statue in Miquella's Haligtree canopy.

name: Lost Ashes of War - Subterranean Shunning-Grounds
description: Lost Ashes of War. Found in the room before Dung Eater's cell in the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds beneath the Royal Capital. Beware the Giant Spider Hand that emerges as you loot the item.

name: Lump of Flesh
description: can be looted from a corpse by the beachside near the Seaside Ruins Site of Grace in south of Limgrave. The corpse is being guarded by a Giant Crab.

name: Lump of Flesh
description: Crafting Material. Found on a corpse on the field.

name: Lunar Estate Ruins
description: The ruins of a large estate found in the southern plateau of Liurnia, accessible only after making significant progress in Ranni's questline.

name: Lusat's Glintstone Staff
description: Glintstone Staff. Found in a chest in the building north of the Nox Swordstress & Nox Priest bosses' chamber after defeating them.

name: Lux Ruins
description: Ruins located north of the Grand Lift of Dectus.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head (Caelem Ruins)
description: Dual Boss Fight against two Mad Pumpkin Heads. They are found in an underground room, the entrance to which is in the eastern side of the ruins. No drops but allows access to a treasure room upon defeat.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head (Waypoint Ruins)
description: Field Boss. Found directly below the Waypoint Ruins.

name: Mad Pumpkin Head Ashes
description: Spirit Summon Ash. Dropped by the Erdtree Burial Watchdog duo bosses within the Minor Erdtree Catacombs.

name: Magic Downpour
description: Magic Downpour is a Sorcerie dropped by Preceptor Miriam in the Carian Study Hall.

name: Magic Grease
description: Consumable. 2 found on a corpse on a lower ledge reachable by dropping down.

name: Magic Grease (B)
description: Found in the room behind the rusted bars in the sewers. Can be reached by going underneath the raising floor in the spiked room.

name: Magic Grease (C)
description: Consumable, found at the corridor past the elevator, on a body to the righ side wall.

name: Magic Grease - 1x (Converted Tower)
description: Consumable. Looted as a treasure.

name: Magic-Shrouding Cracked Tear
description: Crystal Tear for the Flask of Wondrous Physick. Dropped by the Erdtree Avatar.

name: Magma Shot
description: Sorcery. Rewarded by Tanith after completing the first letter quest.

name: Magma Whip Candlestick
description: Whip. Rewarded by Patches after completing his Volcano Manor quest.

name: Magma Wyrm
description: Optional Boss, found inside Gael Tunnel. Drops x1 Dragon Heart and Moonveil

name: Magma Wyrm
description: Optional Field Boss. Pops out of the lava in the Volcano Manor dungeon after taking the cage lift down.

name: Magma Wyrm (Mt Gelmir Lava Pool)
description: Boss in the lava pool south of Fort Laiedd. Drops a Dragon Heart and enables the purchase of Magma Breath from the Cathedral of Dragon Communion.

name: Magma Wyrm Makar
description: This Boss fight is accessed through Ruin-Strewn Precipice, upon reaching the Ruin-Strewn Precipice Overlook Site of Grace.

name: Magma Wyrm Site of Grace
description: Site of Grace for Magma Wyrm

name: Magma Wyrm's Scalesword
description: Curved Greatsword dropped by Magma Wyrm Makar

name: Main Academy Gate
description: Site of grace at the main entrance to Raya Lucaria Academy.

name: Main Caria Manor Gate
description: Site of Grace found by the southern gate to Caria Manor. Be careful when traversing the fields outside the manor, as a rain of energy projectiles will constantly bombard you until you reach this Site of Grace.

name: Malefactor's Evergaol
description: Evergaol found on the southern landmass of Liurnia. The boss Adan, Thief of Fire is imprisoned within.

name: Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan
description: Non-Invader Hostile NPC. Found in the fields west of The Shaded Castle. Drops Antspur Rapier, Marais Mask and Marais Robe upon defeat.

name: Malenia's Great Rune
description: Great Rune. Dropped by Malenia, Blade of Miquella upon defeat.

name: Malenia, Blade of Miquella
description: Demigod. Found past a fog door southwest of the Haligtree Roots Site of Grace.

name: Man-Serpent Ashes
description: Spirit Ash. Found on an altar protected by some enemies in Volcano Manor's dungeon.

name: Manor Lower Level
description: Site of Grace found in a chapel building on the west side of the estate.

name: Manor Towershield
description: Can be found near the Liftside Chamber Site of Grace. It's accessed by scaling along the edge outside.

name: Manor Upper Level
description: Site of Grace found in a room in the east. Accessible by using the garden walkways from the chapel building in the west and then taking a lift up a tower.

name: Mantis Blade
description: Can be found inside the Gelmir Hero's Grave

name: Map (Altus Plateau)
description: Can be found near the round, just north of the Altus Highway Junction site of grace

name: Map (Caelid)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals the rest of the Caelid region. Found on a monolith at the Caelid Highway South intersection.

name: Map (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Map for all of Consecrated Snowfield: follow the road north past the snowstorm until you go down and cross a frozen river, then you will spot the map pillar ahead.

name: Map (Dragonbarrow)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals the Dragonbarrow region. Found on a monolith along the road east of the Dragonbarrow West Site of Grace.

name: Map (Leyndell, Royal Capital)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals the Leyndell region. Found on a monolith near the Outer Wall Phantom Tree Site of Grace.

name: Map (Limgrave, East)
description: At the foot of a pillar with ancient writings on it. Unlocks Eastern Limgrave on your map.

name: Map (Limgrave, West)
description: At the foot of a pillar. Unlocks Western Limgrave on your map

name: Map (Liurnia, East)
description: It's in the middle of the swampy lake, by a monument that has highlightened texts over it.

name: Map (Liurnia, West)
description: Map Fragment. Reveals western Liurnia. Found on a monolith along the road by a junction.

name: Map (Mountaintops of The Giants, East)
description: Found at the altar. You can arrive by walking on the chain from the enemy encampment.

name: Map (Mt. Gelmir)
description: Map of Mt. Gelmir region

name: Map (Weeping Peninsula)
description: Map for all of Weeping Peninsula. Found

name: Map Mountaintops of the Giants, West
description: As you leave the Grand Lift of Rold, take the path forward until tou reach a stone monument on your right, interact with it to obtain the map Fragment.

name: Map: Liurnia, North
description: Can be found over a grave-like big stone, at Academy Gate Town,

name: Marais Executioner's Sword
description: Dropped by Elemer of the Briar

name: Marais Mask
description: Light Helm. Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan upon defeat.

name: Marais Robe
description: Light Chest Armor. Dropped by Maleigh Marais, Shaded Castle Castellan upon defeat.

name: Margit, the Fell Omen
description: A large, apparently elder creature, self-proclaimed as "The last of all kings". Drops Talisman Pouch and 12000 Runes upon defeat.

name: Margit, the Fell Omen Site
description: Margit the Fell Omen Site of Grace, located at the boss arena of Margit, near Stormvel Castle.

name: Marika's Soreseal
description: Talisman. Found on an altar in a room requiring 2 Stonesword Keys to unlock. This room is in the southeast, on the lower levels.

name: Marionette Soldier Ashes
description: When you reach the graveyard section, as you cross the other side of the bridge, make a hard left and drop down to find a path that curves to where the Marionette Soldiers are, kill the two soldiers and then loot the corpse that is hanging by the ledge to find this item.

name: Marred Leather Shield
description: Shield. Found on a corpse on a wooden platform, outside the castle walls.

name: Mask of Confidence
description: Helm. Found on a corpse laying on the walls of the secret area of the Carian Study Hall unlocked using the Carian Inverted Statue.

name: Meat Peddler's Bell Bearing
description: Key Item. Dropped by the Bell Bearing Hunter at the Church of Vows upon defeat.

name: Medicine Peddler's Bell Bearing
description: Key Item. Dropped by nighttime invader: Bell Bearing Hunter in Leyndell's Hermit Merchant's Shack

name: Meeting Place Map
description: Can be found at the entrace of the Raya Lucarian academy, on lying corpse.

name: Melina's Set
description: Armor Set comprised of Traveler's Clothes, Traveler's Manchettes and Traveler's Boots. All three pieces are found deep underground in a side room with a large orange flower, adjacent to the Haligtree Roots site of grace. This area can be reached by taking the lift from the large building in the northeast.

name: Memory Stone (A)
description: Memory Upgrade Material. Found in a chest at the top floor of Oridys's Rise.

name: Memory Stone (B)
description: Memory Upgrade Material. Found in a chest on the top floor of the Converted Tower.

name: Memory Stone (D)
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Material. Found on the top floor of Seluvis's Rise.

name: Memory Stone (E)
description: x1 rewarded as a drop upon defeating Red Wolf of Radagon.

name: Memory Stone (F)
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Material. Dropped by Demi-Human Queen Maggie upon defeat.

name: Memory Stone (G)
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Item. Found in a chest at the top of Lenne's Rise. The entrance to the tower is sealed but you can use a Spiritspring in the back of the tower to land on a balcony and gain entry.

name: Memory Stone - X1 TESTU'S RISE
description: Memory Slot Upgrade Material. Found in a chest at the top floor of Testu's Rise.

name: Merchant Kal
description: General Goods Vendor. Found sitting by the fire in the ruins of the Church of Elleh. Sells the Telescope and Crafting Kit key items.

name: Meteoric Ore Blade
description: Katana. Found inside a chest in a small room at the back of an underground hall filled with sarcophagi and Prawn Miners enemies. The entrance is found in the northwest section of the ruins.

name: Meteorite
description: Sorcery. Dropped by the Alabaster Lord upon defeat.

name: Meteorite of Astel
description: Gravity Sorcery. Dropped by Astel, Stars of Darkness, the boss of Yelough Anix Tunnel.

name: Meteorite Staff
description: Glintstone Staff with S scaling but no upgrades. Found on a corpse hanging from a window in Street of Sages Ruins in the swamp of Caelid.

name: Millicent (First Location)
description: Millicent can be found in the Church of the Plague slumped against a wall.

name: Millicent (Fourth Location)
description: Moves here after Godskin Apostle is defeated.

name: Millicent (NPC Invader)
description: Found in the South-East of the Swamp of Aeonia near the geysers

name: Millicent (Second Location)
description: She will appear here, after you give her the Unalloyed Gold Needle

name: Millicent (Third Location)
description: Found at the hill.

name: Millicent's Prosthesis
description:
When you are given the choice between assisting Millicent and challenging her, choose to challenge her. When you kill
her, you will automatically receive this talisman.

name: Mimic's Veil
description: Reusable Key Item. Found in a chest inside the assembly room with the large war table. There is a Banished Knight in this room.

name: Minor Erdtree (Altus Plateau)
description: Minor Erdtree found in the Altus Plateau

name: Minor Erdtree (Caelid)
description: Erdtree of Caelid found in the northwest, near the border to Limgrave.

name: Minor Erdtree (Consecrated Snowfield)
description: Minor Erdtree found in the Consecrated Snowfield

name: Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Northeast)
description: Minor Erdtree in the Northeast part of the Liurnia of the Lakes region.

name: Minor Erdtree (Liurnia Southwest)
description: Minor Erdtree found in the plateaus in the southwest of Liurnia.

name: Minor Erdtree (Mountaintops East)
description: Minor Erdtree found on the eastern half of the Mountaintops of the Giants.

name: Minor Erdtree (Mt. Gelmir)
description: A withered Minor Erdtree found in northern Mt. Gelmir.

name: Minor Erdtree Catacombs
description: Optional Dungeon found behind the Erdtree, in the north.

name: Minor Erdtree Catacombs
description: Site of Grace found within the Minor Erdtree Catacombs, a few steps from the entrance.

name: Minor Erdtree Church
description: Found outside the west gate to Leyndell Capital City surrounding a Minor Erdtree..

name: Minor Erdtree Church
description: The Site of Grace is right in front of the Erdtree.

name: Miquella's Haligtree
description: Legacy Dungeon. North from the Consecrated Snowfield. Miquella's Haligtree is accessed by doing the Evergaol puzzle located at Ordina, Liturgical Town

name: Miquellan Knight's Sword
description: Straight Sword. Found atop a belltower. You can reach this belltower by entering the second alcove on the left of the eastern walkway, heading up the stairs and then jumping onto the tree branch on the balcony. Follow the tree branch up and across to reach the tower.

name: Miranda Powder
description: Once you are back inside, roll onto the blocked door, and loot this on your left. You will get x10 Miranda Powder.

name: Miranda Sprout Ashes
description: Spirit Ashes. Found behind a hidden wall in Caelid Catacombs. You must attack a wall to the right of the staircase to reveal a path to the ashes.

name: Miranda the Blighted Bloom
description: Miranda the Blighted Bloom is a large, poisonous flower within the Tombsward Cave.

name: Miranda the Blighted Bloom / Omenkiller
description: Dual Bossfight against Omenkiller and Miranda the Blighted Bloom at Perfumer's Grotto. Drops Great Omenkiller Cleaver

name: Miriel, Pastor of Vows
description: Miriel is the steward of Church of Vows.

name: Misbegotten Crusader
description: Boss found at the end of the Cave of the Forlorn. Drops Golden Order Greatsword

name: Misbegotten Shortbow
description: There are flying enemies at the top of the castle. Thet may drop this weapon when killed.

name: Misbegotten Warrior
description: Duo boss of Unsightly Catacombs - paired with Perfumer Tricia. Defeating them grants the Perfumer Tricia Ashes spirit ashes.

name: Misericorde
description: Dagger. Found on a corpse inside the Armory. Requires a Stonesword Key in order to dispel the fog gate barring entry.

name: Missionary's Cookbook (3)
description: Cookbook item. Found on one of the two corpses in the Smoldering Church.

name: Missionary's Cookbook [4]
description: Can be found on Minor Erdtree Church, Capital area.

name: Mistwood Outskirts
description: Site of Grace situated next to the main road North of Mistwood Ruins, in the middle of a group of large stones.

name: Mistwood Ruins
description: An old ruin occupied by a Lesser Runebear. The site is home to a few prized Trina's Lilies.

name: Mohg, the Omen
description: Located at the end of the Subterranean Shunning-Grounds.

name: Moonfolk Ruins
description: Ruins found in the southwest of the Liurnia of the Lakes region
